foreignNames.name: 花咲く砂地
foreignNames.text:
花咲く砂地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
花咲く砂地が戦場に出たとき、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{T}：{G}か{W}を加える。

foreignNames.name: 꽃피는 사막
foreignNames.text:
꽃피는 사막은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
꽃피는 사막이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{T}: {G} 또는 {W}를 추가한다.

foreignNames.name: Areias Verdejantes
foreignNames.text:
Areias Verdejantes entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Areias Verdejantes entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {W}.

foreignNames.name: Цветущие Пески
foreignNames.text:
Цветущие Пески выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
Когда Цветущие Пески выходят на поле битвы, вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{T}: добавьте {G} или {W}.

foreignNames.name: 繁花沙洲
foreignNames.text:
繁花沙洲须横置进战场。
当繁花沙洲进战场时，你获得1点生命。
{T}：加{G}或{W}。

foreignNames.name: 繁花沙洲
foreignNames.text:
繁花沙洲須橫置進戰場。
當繁花沙洲進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。
{T}：加{G}或{W}。

cards.originalText:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

cards.name: Bonders' Enclave
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: There is a sanctuary that reveals itself only to those graced by the *eludha*—the mystical connection between bonder and monster.

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re activating the last ability of Bonders’ Enclave, no player may take actions until you’ve finished activating it. Notably, opponents can’t try to change whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Once you’ve activated the last ability of Bonders’ Enclave, it doesn’t check again at any point whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

foreignNames.name: Enklave der Bynder
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{3}, {T}: Ziehe eine Karte. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Es gibt einen Zufluchtsort, der sich nur denjenigen offenbart, die von *Eludha* gesegnet wurden — der mystischen Verbindung zwischen Bynder und Monster.

foreignNames.name: Enclave de los vinculadores
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{3}, {T}: Roba una carta. Activa esta habilidad solo si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más.
foreignNames.flavor: Hay un santuario que solo se muestra a los agraciados por la *eludha*, la conexión mística entre vinculador y monstruo.

foreignNames.name: Enclave des brideurs
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{3}, {T} : Piochez une carte. N'activez cette capacité que si vous contrôlez une créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4.
foreignNames.flavor: Il existe un sanctuaire qui ne se dévoile qu'à ceux touchés par la grâce de l'*éludha* : la connexion mystique entre un brideur et un monstre.

foreignNames.name: Enclave dei Vincolatori
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{3}, {T}: Pesca una carta. Attiva questa abilità solo se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4.
foreignNames.flavor: Esiste un santuario che si rivela solo a coloro che sono stati benedetti dall'*eludha*: il legame mistico tra vincolatore e mostro.

foreignNames.name: 眷者の居留地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{3}, {T}：カードを１枚引く。この能力は、あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているときにのみ起動できる。
foreignNames.flavor: *エルーダ*に恵まれた者の前にのみ現れる聖域がある。怪物と不思議な絆を結んだ者たちの聖域だ。

foreignNames.name: 유대자의 거주지
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {C}를 추가한다.
{3}, {T}: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종할 때에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 유대자와 괴수의 신비한 연결인 *엘루다*의 축복을 받은 자들에게만 모습을 드러내는 성소가 있다.

foreignNames.name: Enclave dos Vinculadores
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{3}, {T}: Compre um card. Ative esta habilidade somente se você controlar uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4.
foreignNames.flavor: Há um santuário que só se revela aos agraciados com a *eludha*, a conexão mística entre vinculador e monstro.

foreignNames.name: Анклав Узомантов
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{3}, {T}: возьмите карту. Активируйте эту способность, только если вы контролируете существо с силой не менее 4.
foreignNames.flavor: Это убежище, которое показывается только тем, кто наделен даром *элудха* — таинственной связью между узомантом и чудовищем.

foreignNames.name: 持绊人秘境
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{3}，{T}：抓一张牌。只能于你操控力量等于或大于4的生物时起动此异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 联系持绊人与怪兽之间的神秘纽带称作*灵绊*，而有处庇护地只向持有这类羁绊者敞开大门。

foreignNames.name: 持絆人秘境
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{3}，{T}：抽一張牌。只能於你操控力量等於或大於4的生物時起動此異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 聯繫持絆人與怪獸之間的神秘紐帶稱作*靈絆*，而有處庇護地只向持有這類羈絆者敞開大門。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Bonders' Enclave
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

rulings.text: Once you announce that you’re activating the last ability of Bonders’ Enclave, no player may take actions until you’ve finished activating it. Notably, opponents can’t try to change whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Once you’ve activated the last ability of Bonders’ Enclave, it doesn’t check again at any point whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

cards.name: Boneyard Lurker
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{B/G}{B/G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

foreignNames.name: Knochengrund-Lauerer
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}{B/G}{B/G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Acechador del osario
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {2}{B/G}{B/G}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Siempre que esta criatura mute, regresa la carta de permanente objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignNames.name: Guetteur de l'ossuaire
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}{B/G}{B/G} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, renvoyez une carte de permanent ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Predatore dell'Ossario
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {2}{B/G}{B/G} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, riprendi in mano una carta permanente bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 骨塚潜み
foreignNames.text:
変容{2}{B/G}{B/G}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、あなたの墓地からパーマネント・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 납골지 잠복꾼
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {2}{B/G}{B/G} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 당신의 무덤에 있는 지속물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Espreitador do Ossário
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {2}{B/G}{B/G} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Toda vez que esta criatura sofrer mutação, devolva o card de permanente alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Охотник с Могильника
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {2}{B/G}{B/G} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, верните целевую карту перманента из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: 聚骨场蛰兽
foreignNames.text:
合变{2}{B/G}{B/G}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
每当此生物合变时，将目标永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 聚骨場蟄獸
foreignNames.text:
合變{2}{B/G}{B/G}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
每當此生物合變時，將目標永久物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

cards.originalText:
Mutate {2}{BG}{BG} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Boneyard Lurker
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{B/G}{B/G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Boon of the Wish-Giver
cards.text:
Draw four cards.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor:
"There is no law of nature that I have not seen Illuna break. Makes you wonder what is truly possible, does it not?"
—Rielle, the Everwise

foreignNames.name: Segen des Wunscherfüllers
foreignNames.text:
Ziehe vier Karten.
Umwandlung {1} ({1}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
foreignNames.flavor:
„Es gibt kein Naturgesetz, das Illuna nicht gebrochen hat. Das lässt einen fragen, was wirklich möglich ist, nicht wahr?"
—Rielle die Allwissende

foreignNames.name: Bendición del Otorgadeseos
foreignNames.text:
Roba cuatro cartas.
Ciclo {1}. ({1}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"No hay ninguna ley de la naturaleza que Illuna no haya quebrantado. Hace que uno se pregunte qué es realmente posible, ¿no?".
—Rielle, la Versada

foreignNames.name: Faveur de l'accordeur de souhaits
foreignNames.text:
Piochez quatre cartes.
Recyclage {1} ({1}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
foreignNames.flavor:
« Aucune loi de la nature ne peut résister à la force d'Illuna. Cela remet en question tant de choses, n'est-ce pas ? »
—Rielle, l'éternisciente

foreignNames.name: Favore del Donadesideri
foreignNames.text:
Pesca quattro carte.
Ciclo {1} ({1}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Non esiste alcuna legge della natura che non abbia visto infrangere da Illuna. Fa riflettere su cosa sia davvero possibile, vero?"
—Rielle, l'Onnisapiente

foreignNames.name: 願い与えの加護
foreignNames.text:
カードを４枚引く。
サイクリング{1}（{1}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「イルーナが破らなかった自然の法則など見たことがない。実際どこまで可能なのか不思議に思わないかい？」
――常智のリエール

foreignNames.name: 소원을 들어주는 자의 축복
foreignNames.text:
카드 네 장을 뽑는다.
순환 {1} ({1}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"일루나가 깨지 못한 자연의 법칙은 없다네. 진정으로 가능한 것이 무엇인지가 궁금해지지, 그렇지 않은가?"
—지고의 현인, 리엘

foreignNames.name: Dádiva da Realizadora de Desejos
foreignNames.text:
Compre quatro cards.
Reciclar {1} ({1}, descarte este card: Compre um card.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Não há lei da natureza que eu não tenha visto Illuna violar. Faz você se perguntar o que é possível, não?"
— Rielle, a Onissapiente

foreignNames.name: Дар Исполнителя Желаний
foreignNames.text:
Возьмите четыре карты.
Цикл {1} ({1}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
foreignNames.flavor:
«На моих глазах Иллуна нарушал все мыслимые законы природы. Заставляет задуматься, что на самом деле возможно, а что нет, не так ли?»
— Риэлль, Вечномудрая

foreignNames.name: 控念兽恩泽
foreignNames.text:
抓四张牌。
循环{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「我亲眼见到依卢那一一打破世间诸多必然法则。你难道不好奇何事才算作『或然』吗？」
～全知利艾尔

foreignNames.name: 控念獸恩澤
foreignNames.text:
抽四張牌。
循環{1}（{1}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「我親眼見到依盧那一一打破世間諸多必然法則。你難道不好奇何事才算作『或然』嗎？」
～全知利艾爾

cards.originalText:
Draw four cards.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Boot Nipper
cards.text: Boot Nipper enters the battlefield with your choice of a deathtouch counter or a lifelink counter on it.
cards.flavor:
"I have a number of hyper-specific phobias and this somehow hits all of them."
—Aaru, Zagoth lumberjack

foreignNames.name: Fersenbeißer
foreignNames.text: Der Fersenbeißer kommt mit einer Todesberührung- oder einer Lebensverknüpfung-Marke ins Spiel (du entscheidest).
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich habe einige hyperspezifische Phobien und das löst sie irgendwie alle aus."
—Aaru, Zagoth-Holzfäller

foreignNames.name: Muerdebotas
foreignNames.text: El Muerdebotas entra al campo de batalla con lo que elijas sobre él: un contador de toque mortal o un contador de vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Tengo varias fobias de lo más específicas, y de algún modo esto las incluye a todas".
—Aaru, leñador de Zagoth

foreignNames.name: Pince-bottes
foreignNames.text: Le Pince-bottes arrive sur le champ de bataille avec, selon votre choix, un marqueur « contact mortel » ou un marqueur « lien de vie » sur lui.
foreignNames.flavor:
« J'ai plusieurs phobies très spécifiques, et bizarrement, cette créature les déclenche toutes à la fois. »
—Aaru, bûcheron de Zagoth

foreignNames.name: Mordistivali
foreignNames.text: Il Mordistivali entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino tocco letale o un segnalino legame vitale a tua scelta.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ho una serie di fobie estremamente specifiche e in qualche modo questo le include tutte."
—Aaru, boscaiolo di Zagoth

foreignNames.name: 靴かじり
foreignNames.text: 靴かじりは、接死カウンター１個か絆魂カウンター１個のうちあなたが選んだ１つが置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor:
「俺には、かなり具体的な恐怖症がいくつかあるんだけど、どういうわけかこいつはその全部に当てはまるよ。」
――ゼイゴスの木こり、アアル

foreignNames.name: 신발을 물어뜯는 자
foreignNames.text: 신발을 물어뜯는 자는 치명타 카운터 또는 생명연결 카운터 중 당신이 선택한 카운터를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"난 엄청나게 상세한 공포증들을 여러 개 가지고 있는데, 이 녀석은 어째서인지 거기에 모두 해당돼."
—자고스 벌목꾼, 아루

foreignNames.name: Belisca-botas
foreignNames.text: Belisca-botas entra no campo de batalha com um marcador de toque mortífero ou um marcador de vínculo com a vida, à sua escolha.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Eu tenho várias fobias superespecíficas, e de alguma forma essa coisa provoca todas elas."
— Aaru, lenhador de Zagoth

foreignNames.name: Сапожный Кусака
foreignNames.text: Сапожный Кусака выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном Смертельного касания или одним жетоном Цепи жизни на нем по вашему выбору.
foreignNames.flavor:
«У меня есть несколько очень специфических фобий, и в нем каким-то образом воплотились они все».
— Аару, заготский дровосек

foreignNames.name: 啮靴兽
foreignNames.text: 啮靴兽进战场时上面依你的选择有一个死触指示物或一个系命指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我有一些在非常特定的情况下才会发作的恐惧症，而这东西竟能引致它们全都发作。」
～札苟斯樵夫亚鲁

foreignNames.name: 嚙靴獸
foreignNames.text: 嚙靴獸進戰場時上面依你的選擇有一個死觸指示物或一個繫命指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我有一些在非常特定的情況下才會發作的恐懼症，而這東西竟能引致它們全都發作。」
～札苟斯樵夫亞魯

cards.originalText: Boot Nipper enters the battlefield with your choice of a deathtouch counter or a lifelink counter on it.

cards.name: Bristling Boar
cards.text: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.
cards.flavor:
"I can bring down anything in Zagoth, but for some quarry the ratio of fight to meat is too high."
—Master Hunter Chevill

rulings.text: If Bristling Boar gains menace, it can’t be blocked at all.

foreignNames.name: Borstiges Wildschwein
foreignNames.text: Das Borstige Wildschwein kann nicht von mehr als einer Kreatur geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich kann in Zagoth alles besiegen, doch manche Beute liefert zu viel Kampf und zu wenig Fleisch."
—Meisterjäger Chevill

foreignNames.name: Jabalí encrespado
foreignNames.text: El Jabalí encrespado no puede ser bloqueado por más de una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Puedo acabar con cualquier cosa de Zagoth, pero hay presas contra las que hay que luchar demasiado para la carne que se obtiene".
—Chevill, maestro cazador

foreignNames.name: Sanglier hérissé
foreignNames.text: Le Sanglier hérissé ne peut pas être bloqué par plus d'une créature.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je peux chasser n'importe quelle bête de Zagoth, mais certaines sont trop coriaces pour que ça en vaille la peine. »
—Maître chasseur Chévill

foreignNames.name: Cinghiale Irsuto
foreignNames.text: Il Cinghiale Irsuto non può essere bloccato da più di una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Posso abbattere qualsiasi creatura di Zagoth, ma per alcune prede il rapporto tra lotta e carne è troppo alto."
—Maestro di caccia Chevill

foreignNames.name: 逆毛の猪
foreignNames.text: 逆毛の猪は、２体以上のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor:
「ゼイゴスにいるものなら何だって仕留められるが、中には肉が苦労に見合わない獲物もいるんでな。」
――練達の狩人、チェビル

foreignNames.name: 성난 멧돼지
foreignNames.text: 성난 멧돼지는 생물 하나에게만 방어될 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"난 자고스에 있는 거라면 어떤 놈이든 쓰러뜨릴 수 있지만, 사냥감 중 몇 놈은 싸워서 얻는 고기 비율이 아주 높지."
—사냥의 대가 체빌

foreignNames.name: Javali Eriçado
foreignNames.text: Javali Eriçado não pode ser bloqueado por mais de uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sou capaz de abater qualquer coisa em Zagoth, mas com algumas presasa relação custo-benefício é alta demais."
— Mestre Caçador Chevill

foreignNames.name: Щетинистый Вепрь
foreignNames.text: Щетинистый Вепрь не может быть заблокирован более чем одним существом.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я могу добыть в Заготе что угодно, но с некоторой дичью возни выходит куда больше, чем мяса».
— мастер-охотник Чевилл

foreignNames.name: 鬃毛野猪
foreignNames.text: 鬃毛野猪不能被多于一个生物阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor:
「札苟斯境内一切怪兽都不是我对手，但有些猎物之肉量贴补不上所耗损的搏斗精力。」
～狩猎大师车维尔

foreignNames.name: 鬃毛野豬
foreignNames.text: 鬃毛野豬不能被多於一個生物阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor:
「札苟斯境內一切怪獸都不是我對手，但有些獵物之肉量貼補不上所耗損的搏鬥精力。」
～狩獵大師車維爾

cards.originalText: Bristling Boar can't be blocked by more than one creature.

cards.name: Brokkos, Apex of Forever
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{U/B}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Trample
You may cast Brokkos, Apex of Forever from your graveyard using its mutate ability.

rulings.text: Casting Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability doesn’t change when you can cast it.
If you cast Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability, you must pay its mutate cost to cast it. You can’t choose to pay its mana cost or another alternative cost.
If another effect gives you permission to cast Brokkos from your graveyard, you may cast it for any cost associated with that permission.

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Apex der Ewigkeit
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Du kannst Brokkos, Apex der Ewigkeit, mithilfe seiner Mutation-Fähigkeit aus deinem Friedhof wirken.

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Alfa de la Eternidad
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {2}o{U/B}{G}{G}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Arrolla.
Puedes lanzar a Brokkos, Alfa de la Eternidad desde tu cementerio usando su habilidad de mutación.

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Zénith de l'éternité
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Piétinement
Vous pouvez lancer Brokkos, Zénith de l'éternité depuis votre cimetière avec sa capacité de mutation.

foreignNames.name: Broykos, Alfa dell'Eternità
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Travolgere
Puoi lanciare Broykos, Alfa dell'Eternità dal tuo cimitero usando la sua abilità mutazione.

foreignNames.name: 永遠の頂点、ブロコス
foreignNames.text:
変容{2}o{U/B}{G}{G}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
トランプル
あなたは、あなたの墓地から永遠の頂点、ブロコスを、これの変容能力を使って唱えてもよい。

foreignNames.name: 영원의 정점, 브로코스
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
돌진
당신은 영원의 정점, 브로코스의 돌연변이화 능력을 사용해 브로코스를 당신의 무덤에서 발동할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Ápice da Eternidade
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Atropelar
Você pode conjurar Brokkos, Ápice da Eternidade, do seu cemitério usando sua habilidade de mutação.

foreignNames.name: Броккос, Венец Вечности
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {2}o{U/B}{G}{G} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Пробивной удар
Вы можете разыгрывать Броккоса, Венец Вечности из вашего кладбища, используя его способность Мутации.

foreignNames.name: 恒天霸犀布洛寇
foreignNames.text:
合变{2}o{U/B}{G}{G}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
践踏
你可以从你的坟墓场中利用恒天霸犀布洛寇的合变异能来施放之。

foreignNames.name: 恆天霸犀布洛寇
foreignNames.text:
合變{2}o{U/B}{G}{G}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
踐踏
你可以從你的墳墓場中利用恆天霸犀布洛寇的合變異能來施放之。

cards.originalText:
Mutate {2}{UB}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Trample
You may cast Brokkos, Apex of Forever from your graveyard using its mutate ability.

cards.name: Brokkos, Apex of Forever
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{U/B}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Trample
You may cast Brokkos, Apex of Forever from your graveyard using its mutate ability.

rulings.text: Casting Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability doesn’t change when you can cast it.
If you cast Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability, you must pay its mutate cost to cast it. You can’t choose to pay its mana cost or another alternative cost.
If another effect gives you permission to cast Brokkos from your graveyard, you may cast it for any cost associated with that permission.

cards.name: Brokkos, Apex of Forever
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{U/B}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Trample
You may cast Brokkos, Apex of Forever from your graveyard using its mutate ability.

rulings.text: Casting Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability doesn’t change when you can cast it.
If you cast Brokkos with the permission granted by its last ability, you must pay its mutate cost to cast it. You can’t choose to pay its mana cost or another alternative cost.
If another effect gives you permission to cast Brokkos from your graveyard, you may cast it for any cost associated with that permission.

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Apex der Ewigkeit
foreignNames.flavor: Bio-Quarz Spacegodzilla

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Alfa de la Eternidad
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {2}o{U/B}{G}{G}.
Arrolla.
Puedes lanzar a Brokkos, Alfa de la Eternidad desde tu cementerio usando su habilidad de mutación.
foreignNames.flavor: Spacegodzilla biocuarzo

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Zénith de l'éternité
foreignNames.flavor: Spacegodzilla à bio-quartz

foreignNames.name: Broykos, Alfa dell'Eternità
foreignNames.flavor: Spacegodzilla al Bioquarzo

foreignNames.name: 永遠の頂点、ブロコス
foreignNames.flavor: 結（けっ）晶（しょう）怪（かい）獣（じゅう）、スペースゴジラ

foreignNames.name: 영원의 정점, 브로코스
foreignNames.flavor: 바이오쿼츠 스페이스고질라

foreignNames.name: Brokkos, Ápice da Eternidade
foreignNames.flavor: Spacegodzilla de Bioquartzo

foreignNames.name: Броккос, Венец Вечности
foreignNames.flavor: Биокварцевый Космогодзилла

foreignNames.name: 恒天霸犀布洛寇
foreignNames.flavor: 生化晶兽太空哥斯拉

foreignNames.name: 恆天霸犀布洛寇
foreignNames.flavor: 生化晶獸太空哥吉拉

cards.name: Bushmeat Poacher
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "If you've never feasted on Zagoth terror-pig, I got the best price you'll find."

rulings.text: Use the sacrificed creature’s toughness as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how much life you gain.
You draw only one card, no matter how much life you gain.

foreignNames.name: Buschfleisch-Wilderin
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, opfere eine andere Kreatur: Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Widerstandskraft der geopferten Kreatur dazu. Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Du hast noch nie das Fleisch eines Zagoth-Terrorschweins gekostet? Ich habe die besten Preise."

foreignNames.name: Cazadora de carne
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrificar otra criatura: Ganas una cantidad de vidas igual a la resistencia de esa criatura. Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Si nunca has probado el cerdo de las tinieblas de Zagoth, no lo encontrarás más barato que aquí".

foreignNames.name: Braconnière de gibier
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrifiez une autre créature : Vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal à l'endurance de cette créature. Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Si vous n'avez jamais goûté au porceterreur de Zagoth, je peux vous faire un bon prix. »

foreignNames.name: Cacciatrice di Frodo di Selvaggina
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifica un'altra creatura: Guadagni punti vita pari alla costituzione di quella creatura. Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se non hai mai assaggiato il suino del terrore di Zagoth, ti faccio il prezzo migliore sulla piazza."

foreignNames.name: 野生肉の密猟者
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, 他のクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる：あなたはそのクリーチャーのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを得る。カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ゼイゴスの暴れ豚をまだ味わったことがないなら、どこよりもいい値段で売ってあげるわよ。」

foreignNames.name: 야생고기 밀렵꾼
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, 다른 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 당신은 그 생물의 방어력만큼 생명점을 얻는다. 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "자고스 공포돼지를 먹어본 적이 없으면, 좋은 가격에 넘겨줄게."

foreignNames.name: Caçadora de Carne Selvagem
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrifique outra criatura: Você ganha uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual à resistência da criatura sacrificada. Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Se você nunca se banqueteou com um porco-do-terror de Zagoth, eu tenho o melhor preço do mercado."

foreignNames.name: Диколовчая Браконьерша
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, пожертвуйте другое существо: вы получаете количество жизней, равное выносливости того существа. Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Если тебе никогда не доводилось лакомиться заготским страхосвином, то лучшей цены, чем у меня, ты не найдешь».

foreignNames.name: 野味盗猎者
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「要是你从未尝过札苟斯恐猪的味道，我这里的价格最公道。」

foreignNames.name: 野味盜獵者
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}，犧牲另一個生物：你獲得等同於該生物防禦力的生命。抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「要是你從未嘗過札苟斯恐豬的味道，我這裡的價格最公道。」

cards.originalText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Draw a card.

cards.name: Call of the Death-Dweller
cards.text: Return up to two target creature cards with total converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a deathtouch counter on either of them. Then put a menace counter on either of them.
cards.flavor: The living fear Nethroi's whispers. The dead heed them.

rulings.text: If a card in a player’s graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
You could target a single creature card with Call of the Death-Dweller. In this case, you’ll put both counters on that creature.
If you return two creature cards, you may put one counter on each or put both counters on one.
If you return no creature cards to the battlefield, you won’t put any counters on any creatures.

foreignNames.name: Ruf des Todbrüters
foreignNames.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl mit umgewandelten Manakosten von insgesamt 3 oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Lege eine Todesberührung-Marke auf eine davon. Lege dann eine Bedrohlich-Marke auf eine davon.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Lebenden fürchten das Flüstern Nethrois. Die Toten folgen ihm.

foreignNames.name: Llamada del Habitante de la Muerte
foreignNames.text: Regresa hasta dos cartas de criatura objetivo con un coste de maná convertido total de 3 o menos de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Pon un contador de toque mortal sobre cualquiera de ellas. Luego pon un contador de amenaza sobre cualquiera de ellas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los vivos temen los susurros de Nethroi. Los muertos los obedecen.

foreignNames.name: Appel du Thanatophile
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière jusqu'à deux cartes de créature ciblées avec un coût converti de mana total inférieur ou égal à 3. Mettez un marqueur « contact mortel » sur l'une d'entre elles. Puis mettez un marqueur « menace » sur l'une d'entre elles.
foreignNames.flavor: Les mortels sont terrifiés par les murmures de Nethroï. Les morts, eux, répondent à son appel.

foreignNames.name: Richiamo del Dimoramorte
foreignNames.text: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia fino a due carte creatura bersaglio con costo di mana convertito totale pari o inferiore a 3 dal tuo cimitero. Metti un segnalino tocco letale su una di esse. Poi metti un segnalino minacciare su una di esse.
foreignNames.flavor: I vivi temono i sussurri di Nethroi. I morti li eseguono.

foreignNames.name: 死住まいの呼び声
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード最大２枚を点数で見たマナ・コストの合計が３以下になるように対象とし、それらを戦場に戻す。それらのうち１つの上に接死カウンターを１個置く。その後それらのうち１つの上に威迫カウンターを１個置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 生者はネスロイの囁きを恐れる。死者は耳を澄まして聞く。

foreignNames.name: 죽음 거주자의 부름
foreignNames.text: 당신의 무덤에서 총 전환마나비용이 3 이하가 되도록 생물 카드를 최대 두 장까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드들을 전장으로 되돌린다. 그중 한 생물에 치명타 카운터를 올려놓는다. 그 후, 그중 한 생물에 호전적 카운터를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 산 자들은 네스로이의 속삭임을 두려워한다. 죽은 자들은 그 소리에 주의를 기울인다.

foreignNames.name: Chamado do Mortívago
foreignNames.text: Devolva até dois cards de criatura alvo com custo de mana convertido total igual ou inferior a 3 de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha. Coloque um marcador de toque mortífero em um deles. Em seguida, coloque um marcador de ameaçar em um deles.
foreignNames.flavor: Os vivos temem os sussurros de Nethroi. Os mortos os escutam.

foreignNames.name: Зов Обитателя Смерти
foreignNames.text: Верните из вашего кладбища на поле битвы не более двух целевых карт существ с суммарной конвертированной мана-стоимостью не более 3. Положите на любое из них один жетон Смертельного касания. Затем положите на любое из них один жетон Угрозы.
foreignNames.flavor: Живые страшатся шепота Нетроя. Мертвые повинуются ему.

foreignNames.name: 夺命狮召唤
foreignNames.text: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且这些牌总法术力费用的总和须等于或小于3。在这些生物之一上放置一个死触指示物。然后在这些生物之一上放置一个威慑指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 生者畏惧涅司罗的低语，而死者则从其召唤。

foreignNames.name: 奪命獅召喚
foreignNames.text: 將至多兩張目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場，且這些牌總魔法力費用的總和須等於或小於3。在這些生物之一上放置一個死觸指示物。然後在這些生物之一上放置一個威懾指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 生者畏懼涅司羅的低語，而死者則從其召喚。

cards.originalText: Return up to two target creature cards with total converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a deathtouch counter on either of them. Then put a menace counter on either of them.

cards.name: Capture Sphere
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

foreignNames.name: Gefängnissphäre
foreignNames.text:
Aufblitzen
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Gefängnissphäre ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignNames.name: Esfera de captura
foreignNames.text:
Destello.
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Esfera de captura entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignNames.name: Sphère de capture
foreignNames.text:
Flash
Enchanter : créature
Quand la Sphère de capture arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignNames.name: Sfera di Cattura
foreignNames.text:
Lampo
Incanta creatura
Quando la Sfera di Cattura entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignNames.name: 捕獲球
foreignNames.text:
瞬速
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
捕獲球が戦場に出たとき、エンチャントしているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。

foreignNames.name: 포획 구체
foreignNames.text:
섬광
생물에게 부여
포획 구체가 전장에 들어올 때, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.

foreignNames.name: Esfera de Captura
foreignNames.text:
Lampejo
Encantar criatura
Quando Esfera de Captura entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não é desvirada durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.

foreignNames.name: Ловчая Сфера
foreignNames.text:
Миг
Зачаровать существо
Когда Ловчая Сфера выходит на поле битвы, поверните зачарованное существо.
Зачарованное существо не разворачивается во время шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.

foreignNames.name: 拘捕法球
foreignNames.text:
闪现
结附于生物
当拘捕法球进战场时，横置所结附的生物。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

foreignNames.name: 拘捕法球
foreignNames.text:
閃現
結附於生物
當拘捕法球進戰場時，橫置所結附的生物。
所結附的生物於其操控者的重置步驟中不能重置。

cards.originalText:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Capture Sphere enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.name: Cathartic Reunion
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.
cards.flavor: The soldier had given up his wealth, his title, even his home, but he had no room for regret. At last, he had saved his friend.

rulings.text: Because discarding two cards is an additional cost, you can’t cast Cathartic Reunion if you don’t have at least two other cards in hand.

foreignNames.name: Emotionales Wiedersehen
foreignNames.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, zwei Karten ab.
Ziehe drei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Soldat gab seinen Wohlstand, seinen Titel und sein Zuhause auf, bereute aber nichts. Wenigstens hatte er seinen Freund gerettet.

foreignNames.name: Reencuentro catártico
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta dos cartas.
Roba tres cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: El soldado había renunciado a su dinero, su título e incluso su hogar, pero no se arrepentía. Por fin había salvado a su amigo.

foreignNames.name: Retrouvailles cathartiques
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous de deux cartes.
Piochez trois cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Le soldat avait abandonné ses richesses, son titre, et même son foyer, mais il ne regrettait rien. Il avait enfin sauvé son ami.

foreignNames.name: Ricongiungimento Catartico
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta due carte.
Pesca tre carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Il soldato aveva rinunciato alle ricchezze, al titolo, perfino alla casa, ma non aveva il minimo rimpianto. Finalmente aveva salvato il suo amico.

foreignNames.name: 安堵の再会
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード２枚を捨てる。
カードを３枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: その兵士は自らの富も称号も、故郷をも捨てたが後悔は無かった。ともかく、友を救うことができたのだ。

foreignNames.name: 후련해지는 재회
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 카드 두 장을 버린다.
카드 세 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 병사는 자신의 재산을, 지위를, 심지어 자신의 집을 포기했지만, 후회는 전혀 하지 않았다. 마침내, 그는 자신의 친구를 구한 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Reunião Catártica
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, descarte dois cards.
Compre três cards.
foreignNames.flavor: O soldado desistira da própria fortuna, do próprio título, e até mesmo do próprio lar, mas não se arrependia. Ele salvara, enfim, seu amigo.

foreignNames.name: Трогательное Воссоединение
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания сбросьте две карты.
Возьмите три карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Солдат отказался от своего богатства, титула, даже от дома — но ни о чем не сожалел. Он спас своего друга.

foreignNames.name: 感人重逢
foreignNames.text:
弃两张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓三张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 士兵放弃了一切财产、荣誉甚至家园，但他毫无一丝后悔。至少，他救出了自己的朋友。

foreignNames.name: 感人重逢
foreignNames.text:
棄兩張牌，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
抽三張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 士兵放棄了一切財產、榮譽甚至家園，但他毫無一絲後悔。至少，他救出了自己的朋友。

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards.
Draw three cards.

cards.name: Cavern Whisperer
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent discards a card.

rulings.text: As the triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then each other opponent in turn order does the same. Then all the chosen cards are discarded at the same time.

cards.name: Cavern Whisperer
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent discards a card.

rulings.text: As the triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then each other opponent in turn order does the same. Then all the chosen cards are discarded at the same time.

foreignNames.name: Höhlenflüsterer
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{B} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, wirft jeder Gegner eine Karte ab.

foreignNames.name: Susurrante de caverna
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {3}{B}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Amenaza. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
Siempre que esta criatura mute, cada oponente descarta una carta.

foreignNames.name: Chuchoteur des cavernes
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{B} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Menace (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, chaque adversaire se défausse d'une carte.

foreignNames.name: Sussurratore delle Caverne
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {3}{B} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Minacciare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, ogni avversario scarta una carta.

foreignNames.name: 洞窟で囁くもの
foreignNames.text:
変容{3}{B}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
威迫（このクリーチャーは２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれカード１枚を捨てる。

foreignNames.name: 동굴 속삭임꾼
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {3}{B} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
호전적 (이 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 각 상대는 카드 한 장을 버린다.

foreignNames.name: Sussurrador das Cavernas
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {3}{B} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Ameaçar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)
Toda vez que esta criatura sofre mutação, cada oponente descarta um card.

foreignNames.name: Пещерный Шептун
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {3}{B} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Угроза (Это существо не может быть заблокировано менее чем двумя существами.)
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, каждый оппонент сбрасывает карту.

foreignNames.name: 洞窟低语怪
foreignNames.text:
合变{3}{B}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）
每当此生物合变时，每位对手各弃一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 洞窟低語怪
foreignNames.text:
合變{3}{B}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
威懾（此生物只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）
每當此生物合變時，每位對手各棄一張牌。

cards.originalText:
Mutate {3}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Channeled Force
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Target player draws X cards. Channeled Force deals X damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.
cards.flavor: Few monsters challenged Narset after they sensed her power.

rulings.text: If you cast Channeled Force without paying its mana cost, you still choose a value for X and discard that many cards. This is because the spell doesn’t have {X} in its mana cost.
If one of Channeled Force’s two targets becomes illegal, the other is still affected as appropriate.

foreignNames.name: Kanalisierte Macht
foreignNames.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, X Karten ab.
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht X Karten. Die Kanalisierte Macht fügt bis zu einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Nur wenige Monster wagten den Kampf mit Narset, nachdem sie ihre Macht gespürt hatten.

foreignNames.name: Fuerza canalizada
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta X cartas.
El jugador objetivo roba X cartas. La Fuerza canalizada hace X puntos de daño a hasta una criatura o planeswalker objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Pocos monstruos desafiaban a Narset tras percibir su poder.

foreignNames.name: Force canalisée
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous de X cartes.
Le joueur ciblé pioche X cartes. La Force canalisée inflige X blessures à jusqu'à une cible, créature ou planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Après avoir senti sa puissance, peu de monstres tentèrent d'affronter Narset.

foreignNames.name: Forza Incanalata
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta X carte.
Un giocatore bersaglio pesca X carte. La Forza Incanalata infligge X danni a fino a una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Pochi mostri osavano sfidare Narset dopo averne percepito il potere.

foreignNames.name: 交感の力
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カードＸ枚を捨てる。
プレイヤー１人と、クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカー合わせて最大１体を対象とする。その前者のプレイヤーはカードをＸ枚引く。交感の力はその後者にＸ点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: その力を感じ取ってからは、ナーセットに挑もうとする怪物はほとんどいなかった。

foreignNames.name: 전달되는 힘
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 카드 X장을 버린다.
플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 X장을 뽑는다. 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 전달되는 힘은 그 목표에게 피해 X점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 몇몇 괴수들은 나르셋의 힘을 감지한 뒤에 그녀에게 도전했다.

foreignNames.name: Força Canalizada
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, descarte X cards.
O jogador alvo compra X cards. Força Canalizada causa X pontos de dano a até uma criatura ou planeswalker alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Poucos monstros desafiaram Narset depois de sentir o poder dela.

foreignNames.name: Направленная Сила
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания сбросьте X карт.
Целевой игрок берет X карт. Направленная Сила наносит X повреждений не более чем одному целевому существу или planeswalker'у.
foreignNames.flavor: Не многие чудовища осмеливались бросить вызов Нарсет, почувствовав ее силу.

foreignNames.name: 通贯魔力
foreignNames.text:
弃X张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
目标牌手抓X张牌。通贯魔力对至多一个目标生物或鹏洛客造成X点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在怪兽感知娜尔施的力量后，胆敢挑战者所剩无几。

foreignNames.name: 通貫魔力
foreignNames.text:
棄X張牌，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
目標玩家抽X張牌。通貫魔力對至多一個目標生物或鵬洛客造成X點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在怪獸感知娜爾施的力量後，膽敢挑戰者所剩無幾。

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Target player draws X cards. Channeled Force deals X damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

cards.name: Charge of the Forever-Beast
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Charge of the Forever-Beast deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the revealed card's power.
cards.flavor: The Zagoth wetlands are fertilized by centuries of Brokkos's former challenges.

rulings.text: You must reveal exactly one card to cast Charge of the Forever-Beast; you can’t cast it without revealing a card, and you can’t reveal additional cards. The revealed card remains revealed until Charge of the Forever-Beast resolves.

As Charge of the Forever-Beast resolves, it deals damage based on the revealed card’s power if it’s still in your hand. If that card has left your hand, Charge of the Forever-Beast deals damage based on the card’s power immediately before it left your hand.

foreignNames.name: Ansturm der Ewigkeitsbestie
foreignNames.text:
Zeige als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Kreaturenkarte aus deiner Hand offen vor.
Der Ansturm der Ewigkeitsbestie fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Stärke der vorgezeigten Karte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Feuchtgebiete von Zagoth sind seit Jahrzehnten mit den einstigen Herausforderern von Brokkos übersät.

foreignNames.name: Carga de la Bestia Infinita
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, muestra una carta de criatura de tu mano.
La Carga de la Bestia Infinita hace una cantidad de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo igual a la fuerza de la carta mostrada.
foreignNames.flavor: Los humedales de Zagoth están fertilizados por siglos de cadáveres de rivales de Brokkos.

foreignNames.name: Charge de la Bête d'éternité
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, révélez une carte de créature de votre main.
La Charge de la Bête d'éternité inflige à une cible, créature ou planeswalker, un nombre de blessures égal à la force de la carte révélée.
foreignNames.flavor: Les marais de Zagoth sont fertilisés depuis des siècles par les carcasses des anciens adversaires de Brokkos.

foreignNames.name: Carica della Bestia Eterna
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, rivela una carta creatura dalla tua mano.
La Carica della Bestia Eterna infligge a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio danno pari alla forza della carta rivelata.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli acquitrini di Zagoth sono fertilizzati da secoli di sfidanti di Broykos.

foreignNames.name: 永遠獣の突撃
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、あなたの手札からクリーチャー・カード１枚を公開する。
クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とする。永遠獣の突撃はそれに、その公開したカードのパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 何世紀にもわたりブロコスに挑んできたものが、ゼイゴスの湿地帯の肥沃な土壌を作っている。

foreignNames.name: 영원한 야수의 돌진
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 당신의 손에서 생물 카드 한 장을 공개한다.
생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 영원한 야수의 돌진은 그 목표에게 공개된 카드의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 브로코스의 옛 도전자들이 자고스 습지에 수 세기 동안 영양분을 공급해 주었다.

foreignNames.name: Carga da Fera Eterna
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, revele um card de criatura da sua mão.
Carga da Fera Eterna causa à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo dano igual ao poder do card revelado.
foreignNames.flavor: Os pantanais de Zagoth são fertilizados pelos cadáveres dos ex-desafiantes de Brokkos caídos nos últimos séculos.

foreignNames.name: Натиск Вечного Зверя
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания покажите карту существа из вашей руки.
Натиск Вечного Зверя наносит целевому существу или planeswalker'у повреждения, равные значению силы показанной карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Низовья Загота на протяжении веков удобряются останками тех, кто бросил вызов Броккосу.

foreignNames.name: 恒天犀冲锋
foreignNames.text:
从你手上展示一张生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
恒天犀冲锋对目标生物或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于所展示之牌的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 数世纪来源源不断的挑战者在布洛寇面前现身，然后化为札苟斯湿地的养分。

foreignNames.name: 恆天犀衝鋒
foreignNames.text:
從你手上展示一張生物牌，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
恆天犀衝鋒對目標生物或鵬洛客造成傷害，其數量等同於所展示之牌的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 數世紀來源源不斷的挑戰者在布洛寇面前現身，然後化為札苟斯濕地的養分。

cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Charge of the Forever-Beast deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the revealed card's power.

cards.name: Checkpoint Officer
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: After what he viewed as Lukka's shocking betrayal, General Kudro enacted stringent security measures at every entry point into Drannith.

foreignNames.name: Offizier des Kontrollpunkts
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Nach Lukkas schockierendem Verrat erließ General Kudro strenge Sicherheitsmaßnahmen an jedem Eingang nach Drannith.

foreignNames.name: Oficial del puesto de control
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Gira la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Tras lo que él consideró una espantosa traición por parte de Lukka, el general Kudro impuso estrictas medidas de seguridad en todas las entradas a Drannith.

foreignNames.name: Officier du poste de contrôle
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T} : Engagez la créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Le Général Koudro mit en place des mesures de sécurité strictes à chaque entrée de Drannith après ce qu'il considérait comme une trahison choquante de la part de Lukka.

foreignNames.name: Ufficiale del Posto di Controllo
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: TAPpa una creatura bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Dopo quello che considerò uno sconcertante tradimento da parte di Lukka, il Generale Kudro stabilì rigide misure di sicurezza per tutti i punti di accesso a Drannith.

foreignNames.name: 検問官
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: クードロ将軍は、ルーカが突然裏切ったと見たあの日以来、ドラニスの入り口すべてに厳戒体制を敷くようになった。

foreignNames.name: 검문소 장교
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 루카의 충격적인 배신을 목격하고 난 뒤, 쿠드로 장군은 드라니스로 진입하는 모든 지점에 엄격한 보안 조치를 시행했다.

foreignNames.name: Oficial do Posto de Controle
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Vire a criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Depois do que viu como uma traição absurda de Lukka, o General Kudro instituiu medidas de segurança rigorosas em todas as entradas de Drannith.

foreignNames.name: Офицер Заставы
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}, {T}: поверните целевое существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Став свидетелем тому, что он воспринял как предательство Лукки, потрясенный до глубины души генерал Кудро велел поставить бдительных стражников у каждого прохода в Драннит.

foreignNames.name: 关卡长官
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}，{T}：横置目标生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇卓将军把卢卡所为视作可憎叛行，于是他下令在通往卓尼斯的各处入口严加防范。

foreignNames.name: 關卡長官
foreignNames.text: {1}{W}，{T}：橫置目標生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 寇卓將軍把盧卡所為視作可憎叛行，於是他下令在通往卓尼斯的各處入口嚴加防範。

cards.originalText: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.name: Chevill, Bane of Monsters
cards.text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no permanents with bounty counters on them, put a bounty counter on target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Whenever a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter on it dies, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

rulings.text: Chevill’s middle ability and last ability look for any bounty counter on your opponents’ permanents, not just one from that Chevill. For example, if players A and B each control a Chevill and player A has put a bounty counter on player C’s creature, player B’s Chevill won’t put a counter on anything and both players will gain 3 life and draw a card when that creature dies.

If the creature or planeswalker with a bounty counter on it ceases to be a creature or planeswalker, Chevill’s last ability will still trigger if that permanent is put into a graveyard from the battlefield.

If Chevill leaves the battlefield at the same time that an opponent’s permanent with a bounty counter on it dies, you gain 3 life and draw a card. If Chevill leaves the battlefield before that permanent dies, Chevill’s last ability won’t be around to trigger.
If your life total is brought to 0 or less at the same time that a creature with a bounty counter on it is dealt lethal damage, you lose the game before the last ability goes on the stack.

foreignNames.name: Chevill, Erzfeind der Monster
foreignNames.text:
Todesberührung
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls deine Gegner keine bleibenden Karten mit Kopfgeldmarken kontrollieren, lege eine Kopfgeldmarke auf eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl, die bzw. den ein Gegner kontrolliert.
Immer wenn eine bleibende Karte, die ein Gegner kontrolliert und auf der eine Kopfgeldmarke liegt, stirbt, erhältst du 3 Lebenspunkte dazu und ziehst eine Karte.

foreignNames.name: Chevill, la Pesadilla de los Monstruos
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortal.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si tus oponentes no controlan permanentes con contadores de recompensa sobre ellos, pon un contador de recompensa sobre la criatura o planeswalker objetivo que controla un oponente.
Siempre que un permanente que controla un oponente con un contador de recompensa sobre él muera, ganas 3 vidas y robas una carta.

foreignNames.name: Chévill, fléau des monstres
foreignNames.text:
Contact mortel
Au début de votre entretien, si vos adversaires ne contrôlent pas de permanents avec des marqueurs « prime » sur eux, mettez un marqueur « prime » sur une cible, créature ou planeswalker, qu'un adversaire contrôle.
À chaque fois qu'un permanent avec un marqueur « prime » qu'un adversaire contrôle meurt, vous gagnez 3 points de vie et vous piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Chevill, Flagello dei Mostri
foreignNames.text:
Tocco letale
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se i tuoi avversari non controllano permanenti con segnalini taglia, metti un segnalino taglia su una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio controllati da un avversario.
Ogniqualvolta un permanente con un segnalino taglia controllato da un avversario muore, guadagni 3 punti vita e peschi una carta.

foreignNames.name: 怪物の災厄、チェビル
foreignNames.text:
接死
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、対戦相手が賞金カウンターが置かれているパーマネントをコントロールしていなかった場合、対戦相手がコントロールしている、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それの上に賞金カウンターを１個置く。
対戦相手がコントロールしていて賞金カウンターが置かれているパーマネントが１つ死亡するたび、あなたは３点のライフを得てカードを１枚引く。

foreignNames.name: 괴수들의 재앙, 체빌
foreignNames.text:
치명타
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 상대들이 현상금 카운터가 놓인 지속물을 조종하지 않는다면, 상대가 조종하는 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표에 현상금 카운터를 올려놓는다.
상대가 조종하는 현상금 카운터가 놓인 지속물이 죽을 때마다, 당신은 생명 3점을 얻고 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Chevill, Ruína dos Monstros
foreignNames.text:
Toque mortífero
No início de sua manutenção, se seus oponentes não controlarem permanentes com marcadores de recompensa, coloque um marcador de recompensa na criatura ou no planeswalker alvo que um oponente controla.
Toda vez que uma permanente que um oponente controla com um marcador de recompensa morre, você ganha 3 pontos de vida e compra um card.

foreignNames.name: Чевилл, Бич Монстров
foreignNames.text:
Смертельное касание
В начале вашего шага поддержки, если под контролем ваших оппонентов нет перманентов с жетонами вознаграждения на них, положите один жетон вознаграждения на целевое существо или planeswalker'а под контролем оппонента.
Каждый раз, когда перманент под контролем оппонента с жетоном вознаграждения на нем умирает, вы получаете 3 жизни и берете карту.

foreignNames.name: 怪兽天敌车维尔
foreignNames.text:
死触
在你的维持开始时，若所有对手均未操控其上有赏金指示物的永久物，则在目标由对手操控的生物或鹏洛客上放置一个赏金指示物。
每当一个由对手操控且其上有赏金指示物的永久物死去时，你获得3点生命并抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 怪獸天敵車維爾
foreignNames.text:
死觸
在你的維持開始時，若所有對手均未操控其上有賞金指示物的永久物，則在目標由對手操控的生物或鵬洛客上放置一個賞金指示物。
每當一個由對手操控且其上有賞金指示物的永久物死去時，你獲得3點生命並抽一張牌。

cards.name: Chittering Harvester
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: As the triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a creature they control, then each other opponent in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

cards.name: Chittering Harvester
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: As the triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, the opponent whose turn it is) chooses a creature they control, then each other opponent in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

foreignNames.name: Fauchender Schnitter
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {4}{B} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, opfert jeder Gegner eine Kreatur.

foreignNames.name: Cosechadora gorjeante
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {4}{B}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Siempre que esta criatura mute, cada oponente sacrifica una criatura.

foreignNames.name: Moissonneur bruyant
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {4}{B} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, chaque adversaire sacrifie une créature.

foreignNames.name: Mietitore Squittente
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {4}{B} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, ogni avversario sacrifica una creatura.

foreignNames.name: 騒がしい収穫者
foreignNames.text:
変容{4}{B}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。

foreignNames.name: 찍찍대는 수확자
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {4}{B} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 각 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.

foreignNames.name: Ceifador Chiador
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {4}{B} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Toda vez que esta criatura sofre mutação, cada oponente sacrifica uma criatura.

foreignNames.name: Верещащий Сборщик
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {4}{B} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, каждый оппонент жертвует существо.

foreignNames.name: 吱响索命妖

每当此生物合变时，每位对手各牺牲一个生物。

foreignNames.name: 吱響索命妖

每當此生物合變時，每位對手各犧牲一個生物。

Whenever this creature mutates, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.name: Clash of Titans
cards.text: Target creature fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
cards.flavor:
"Let the brutes fight. If they kill each other, we lose no more soldiers today."
—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

rulings.text: Clash of Titans can target two creatures controlled by the same player.
If either target is an illegal target as Clash of Titans tries to resolve, neither creature will deal or be dealt damage.

foreignNames.name: Duell der Titanen
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kämpft gegen eine andere Kreatur deiner Wahl. (Jede der Kreaturen fügt der anderen Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.)
foreignNames.flavor:
„Lass die Viecher kämpfen. Wenn sie sich gegenseitig töten, verlieren wir heute keine Soldaten mehr."
—Orthion, Lavagrund-Hauptmann

foreignNames.name: Batalla de titanes
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo lucha contra otra criatura objetivo. (Cada una hace un daño igual a su fuerza a la otra.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Que luchen los salvajes. Si se matan entre ellos, hoy ya no perderemos más soldados".
—Orthion, capitán de Bordelava

foreignNames.name: Choc des titans
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée se bat contre une autre créature ciblée. (Chacune inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à l'autre.)
foreignNames.flavor:
« Laissez ces brutes se battre. Si elles s'entretuent, nous ne perdrons pas d'autres soldats aujourd'hui. »
—Orthion, capitaine de Bourg-sur-Lave

foreignNames.name: Scontro tra Titani
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio lotta con un'altra creatura bersaglio. (Ogni creatura infligge all'altra danno pari alla propria forza.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Lasciate che i bruti combattano. Se si uccidono a vicenda, oggi non perderemo altri soldati."
—Orthion, capitano di Lavariva

foreignNames.name: 巨獣の激突
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体と他のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。（それぞれはもう一方に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「あの獣たちは戦わせておけ。互いに殺し合ってくれれば、今日これ以上兵を失うこともない。」
――ラバブリンクの隊長、オーシオン

foreignNames.name: 거신들의 격돌
foreignNames.text: 생물과 다른 생물을 목표로 정한다. 두 생물은 서로 싸운다. (각 생물은 서로에게 각자의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"서로 싸우게 둬라. 저것들이 서로 죽이면, 오늘은 병사를 더 이상 잃지 않아도 되니까."
—용암가장자리 대장, 오르티온

foreignNames.name: Batalha dos Titãs
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo luta com outra criatura alvo. (Cada uma causa dano igual ao seu poder à outra.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Deixe os brutamontes lutarem. Se eles se matarem não perderemos mais soldados hoje."
— Orthion, capitão de Beiralava

foreignNames.name: Битва Титанов
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо дерется с другим целевым существом. (Они наносят друг другу повреждения, равные своей силе.)
foreignNames.flavor:
«Пусть громилы дерутся. Если прикончат друг друга, мы сегодня больше никого не потеряем».
— Ортион, капитан Лавобрега

foreignNames.name: 巨物相争
foreignNames.text: 目标生物与另一个目标生物互斗。（它们各向对方造成等同于本身力量的伤害。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「先让怪兽互相残杀。如果它们同归于尽，我们今天就不会死人了。」
～熔缘城队长欧席因

foreignNames.name: 巨物相爭
foreignNames.text: 目標生物與另一個目標生物互鬥。（它們各向對方造成等同於本身力量的傷害。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「先讓怪獸互相殘殺。如果牠們同歸於盡，我們今天就不會死人了。」
～熔緣城隊長歐席因

Enchant creature

cards.name: Crystalline Giant
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose a kind of counter at random that Crystalline Giant doesn't have on it from among flying, first strike, deathtouch, hexproof, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, vigilance, and +1/+1. Put a counter of that kind on Crystalline Giant.

rulings.text: You choose a kind of counter at random and put it on Crystalline Giant all while its ability is resolving. Players can’t take actions between the time the choice is made and the time Crystalline Giant has the counter.

As long as Crystalline Giant doesn’t have all ten of the listed counters on it, you’ll put one on it at the beginning of combat on your turn. If it has all ten kinds, the ability will trigger but you won’t put any counter on it.
If Crystalline Giant has one of the listed keywords but not because of a counter of that kind, that kind of counter is still eligible to be chosen at random.

rulings.text: You choose a kind of counter at random and put it on Crystalline Giant all while its ability is resolving. Players can’t take actions between the time the choice is made and the time Crystalline Giant has the counter.

As long as Crystalline Giant doesn’t have all ten of the listed counters on it, you’ll put one on it at the beginning of combat on your turn. If it has all ten kinds, the ability will trigger but you won’t put any counter on it.
If Crystalline Giant has one of the listed keywords but not because of a counter of that kind, that kind of counter is still eligible to be chosen at random.

cards.name: Cunning Nightbonder
cards.text:
Flash
Spells with flash you cast cost {1} less to cast and can't be countered.
cards.flavor: "We are each other's shadow, fleeing yet always present."

rulings.text: Spells with flash that you control but didn’t cast (perhaps because they’re copies of a spell or because you took control of them from another player) can be countered.
Cunning Nightbonder’s last ability doesn’t apply to itself while it’s a spell.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Cunning Nightbonder). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

Cunning Nightbonder’s cost reduction applies only to generic mana in a spell’s cost. It can’t reduce a spell’s colored mana requirements. For example, your first Cunning Nightbonder won’t normally reduce the cost of your second since it has no generic mana in its cost.

A spell or ability that counters spells can still target spells with flash you cast. When that spell or ability resolves, your spell won’t be countered, but any additional effects of the countering spell or ability will still happen.
If Cunning Nightbonder enters the battlefield while a spell with flash that you cast is on the stack, that spell can’t be countered, even though you don’t get the {1} discount.
Players can’t attempt to remove Cunning Nightbonder to raise the cost of a spell you wish to cast, but they can remove it to allow their spells and abilities to counter your spells.

foreignNames.name: 闇の取り引き

「その密猟者が扱っているのは怪物の体じゃない。神話だ。人々は物語の一部となるために金を払うんだ。」
――疫病をもたらす者、ケルシン

foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 본다. 그중 두 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 다른 한 장은 당신의 무덤에 넣는다. 사악한 거래는 당신에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"밀렵꾼이 거래하는 건 괴수들의 부위가 아니야. 신화를 파는 거지. 사람들은 이야기의 일부가 되고 싶어서 돈을 내는 거야."
