부여된 생물은 -2/-2를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"넌 내 사냥감이 아니다, 작은 녀석아. 난 네 울음소리를 듣고 살펴보러 오는 녀석을 노리는 거야."
—역병, 켈시엔

foreignNames.name: Peso Morto
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura
A criatura encantada recebe -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Meu problema não é contigo, pequeno. Eu estou atrás é do que quer que venha investigar os seus gritos."
— Kelsien, a Peste

foreignNames.name: Мертвый Груз
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо получает -2/-2.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Ты мне не нужен, малыш. Я охочусь на того, кто придет посмотреть, кто тут так жалобно кричит».
— Келсиен, Моровая Погибель

foreignNames.name: 重负
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
所结附的生物得-2/-2。
foreignNames.flavor:
「你不是我的猎物，小家伙。我要抓的是闻声赶来的那东西。」
～疫病凯鑫

foreignNames.name: 重負
foreignNames.text:
結附於生物
所結附的生物得-2/-2。
foreignNames.flavor:
「你不是我的獵物，小傢伙。我要逮的是聞聲趕來的那東西。」
～疫病凱鑫

cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

cards.name: Death's Oasis
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, mill two cards. Then return a creature card with lesser converted mana cost than the creature that died from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Death's Oasis: You gain life equal to the highest converted mana cost among creatures you control.

rulings.text: Because the triggered ability doesn’t target the creature card in your graveyard, you may choose one of the two cards you put there from your library.
If a creature on the battlefield or a card in your graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

Use the converted mana cost of the creature as it last existed on the battlefield and the converted mana cost of the creature card as it exists in your graveyard to determine which cards may be returned to your hand. This may result in a creature’s death bringing itself back to your hand; perhaps it was one card of a merged creature, or it had become a copy of a more expensive creature.
If Death’s Oasis becomes a creature, activating its last ability will cause its first ability to trigger.

foreignNames.name: Oase des Todes
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn eine Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, lege die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof. Bringe dann eine Kreaturenkarte mit niedrigeren umgewandelten Manakosten als die der Kreatur, die gestorben ist, aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
{1}, opfere die Oase des Todes: Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der höchsten umgewandelten Manakosten unter den Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, dazu.

foreignNames.name: Oasis de la muerte
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que una criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, pon las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio. Luego regresa una carta de criatura con coste de maná convertido menor que el de la criatura que murió de tu cementerio a tu mano.
{1}, sacrificar el Oasis de la muerte: Ganas una cantidad de vidas igual al mayor coste de maná convertido de entre las criaturas que controlas.

foreignNames.name: Oasis de la mort
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois qu'une créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, mettez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière. Puis renvoyez dans votre main, depuis votre cimetière, une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana inférieur à celui de la créature qui est morte.
{1}, sacrifiez l'Oasis de la mort : Vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal au coût converti de mana le plus élevé parmi les créatures que vous contrôlez.

foreignNames.name: Oasi della Morte
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta una creatura non pedina che controlli muore, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Poi riprendi in mano dal tuo cimitero una carta creatura con costo di mana convertito inferiore a quello della creatura che è morta.
{1}, Sacrifica l'Oasi della Morte: Guadagni punti vita pari al costo di mana convertito maggiore tra le creature che controlli.

foreignNames.name: 死のオアシス
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでないクリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを２枚あなたの墓地に置く。その後、あなたの墓地から点数で見たマナ・コストがその死亡したクリーチャーよりも小さいクリーチャー・カード１枚をあなたの手札に戻す。
{1}, 死のオアシスを生け贄に捧げる：あなたは、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーの中の点数で見たマナ・コストの最大値に等しい点数のライフを得る。

foreignNames.name: 죽음의 오아시스
foreignNames.text:
당신이 조종하는 토큰이 아닌 생물이 죽을 때마다, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 두 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다. 그 후 죽은 생물보다 낮은 전환마나비용을 가진 생물 카드 한 장을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
{1}, 죽음의 오아시스를 희생한다: 당신은 당신이 조종하는 생물들 중에서 가장 큰 전환마나비용만큼 생명점을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Oásis da Morte
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que uma criatura que você controla que não seja uma ficha morrer, coloque os dois cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério. Em seguida, devolva de seu cemitério para sua mão um card de criatura com custo de mana convertido inferior ao da criatura que morreu.
{1}, sacrifique Oásis da Morte: Você ganha uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual ao maior custo de mana convertido entre os das criaturas que você controla.

foreignNames.name: Оазис Смерти
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда не являющееся фишкой существо под вашим контролем умирает, положите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище. Затем верните карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью меньше, чем у умершего существа, из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
{1}, пожертвуйте Оазис Смерти: вы получаете количество жизней, равное наибольшему значению конвертированной мана-стоимости среди существ под вашим контролем.

foreignNames.name: 死亡绿洲
foreignNames.text:
每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，将你牌库顶的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。然后将一张总法术力费用小于死去者的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
{1}，牺牲死亡绿洲：你获得若干生命，其数量等同于由你操控之生物中总法术力费用最大者的数值。

foreignNames.name: 死亡綠洲
foreignNames.text:
每當一個由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去時，將你牌庫頂的兩張牌置入你的墳墓場。然後將一張總魔法力費用小於死去者的生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
{1}，犧牲死亡綠洲：你獲得若干生命，其數量等同於由你操控之生物中總魔法力費用最大者的數值。

cards.originalText:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Then return a creature card with lesser converted mana cost than the creature that died from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Death's Oasis: You gain life equal to the greatest converted mana cost among creatures you control.

cards.name: Death's Oasis
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, mill two cards. Then return a creature card with lesser converted mana cost than the creature that died from your graveyard to your hand.
{1}, Sacrifice Death's Oasis: You gain life equal to the highest converted mana cost among creatures you control.

rulings.text: Because the triggered ability doesn’t target the creature card in your graveyard, you may choose one of the two cards you put there from your library.
If a creature on the battlefield or a card in your graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

Use the converted mana cost of the creature as it last existed on the battlefield and the converted mana cost of the creature card as it exists in your graveyard to determine which cards may be returned to your hand. This may result in a creature’s death bringing itself back to your hand; perhaps it was one card of a merged creature, or it had become a copy of a more expensive creature.
If Death’s Oasis becomes a creature, activating its last ability will cause its first ability to trigger.

cards.name: Dire Tactics
cards.text: Exile target creature. If you don't control a Human, you lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
cards.flavor:
"I will preserve human life at all costs. I will stand alone against behemoths before I let them touch my city. I will hold the wall."
—Oath of the Coppercoats

rulings.text: Use the exiled creature’s toughness as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how much life you lose.

Whether you control a Human is checked only after exiling the target creature. If that creature had exiled a Human you controlled until that creature left the battlefield, that Human will return to the battlefield in time to be counted.

foreignNames.name: Erbitterte Taktik
foreignNames.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil. Falls du keinen Menschen kontrollierst, verlierst du Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Widerstandskraft der Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich beschütze Menschenleben um jeden Preis. Eher stelle ich mich alleine den Behemoths, bevor ich zulasse, dass sie meine Stadt gefährden. Ich bleibe standhaft."
—Eid der Kupferjacken

foreignNames.name: Tácticas desesperadas
foreignNames.text: Exilia la criatura objetivo. Si no controlas un Humano, pierdes una cantidad de vidas igual a la resistencia de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Preservaré la vida humana a toda costa. Me enfrentaré solo a los behemots antes de dejar que toquen mi ciudad. Protegeré el muro".
—Juramento de las Capas de Cobre

foreignNames.name: Tactiques désespérées
foreignNames.text: Exilez la créature ciblée. Si vous ne contrôlez pas d'humain, vous perdez un nombre de points de vie égal à l'endurance de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je protégerai l'humanité coûte que coûte. J'affronterai seul les béhémoths avant qu'ils ne touchent à ma ville. Je leur ferai rempart. »
—Serment des Capes de cuivre

foreignNames.name: Tattica Estrema
foreignNames.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio. Se non controlli un Umano, perdi punti vita pari alla costituzione di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Preserverò la vita umana a ogni costo. Affronterò da solo i behemoth, se significa impedire loro di toccare la mia città. Difenderò il muro."
—Giuramento delle Giubbe Ramate

foreignNames.name: 不吉な戦術
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。あなたが人間をコントロールしていないなら、あなたはそのクリーチャーのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor:
「何に代えても人間の命を守る。たとえ一人でも巨獣に立ち向かい、街には手を出させない。私が壁になる。」
――銅纏いの誓い

foreignNames.name: 끔찍한 전술
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한다. 당신이 인간을 조종하지 않는다면, 당신은 그 생물의 방어력만큼 생명점을 잃는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"나는 어떤 값을 치르더라도 인류를 보호하겠다. 내 한 몸을 밟고 지나가지 않고서는 거대괴수들이 내 도시를 건드릴 수 없다. 나는 방벽을 수호하겠다."
—구리 코트의 서약

foreignNames.name: Táticas Macabras
foreignNames.text: Exile a criatura alvo. Se você não controla um Humano, você perde uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual à resistência daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Preservarei a vida humana a todo custo. Enfrentarei os monstros colossais sozinho, mas não permitirei que toquem em minha cidade. Eu defenderei a muralha."
— Juramento dos Gibões de Cobre

foreignNames.name: Отчаянная Тактика
foreignNames.text: Изгоните целевое существо. Если вы не контролируете Человека, то вы теряете количество жизней, равное выносливости того существа.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я буду защищать человеческую жизнь любой ценой. Я в одиночку встану на пути исполинов, но не позволю им тронуть мой город. Я буду держать стену».
— клятва Медных Кителей

foreignNames.name: 险厄战术
foreignNames.text: 放逐目标生物。如果你未操控人类，则你失去等同于该生物防御力的生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我将不惜代价守护人命。就算孤身也会勇面巨兽，不让它们靠近城市。我定将坚守高墙。」
～紫铜军誓约

foreignNames.name: 險厄戰術
foreignNames.text: 放逐目標生物。如果你未操控人類，則你失去等同於該生物防禦力的生命。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我將不惜代價守護人命。就算孤身也會面對巨獸，不讓牠們靠近城市。我定將堅守高牆。」
～紫銅軍誓約

cards.originalText: Exile target creature. If you don't control a Human, you lose life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Dirge Bat
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flash
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

cards.name: Dirge Bat
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flash
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

foreignNames.name: 哀歌コウモリ (暗黒破壊獣、バトラ) // Battra, Dark Destroyer
foreignNames.text:
変容{4}{B}{B}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
瞬速
飛行
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、対戦相手がコントロールしている、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

cards.name: Dirge Bat
cards.text:
Mutate {4}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flash
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

foreignNames.name: Klagelied-Fledermaus
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {4}{B}{B} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, zerstöre eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl, die bzw. den ein Gegner kontrolliert.

foreignNames.name: Murciélago fúnebre
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {4}{B}{B}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Destello.
Vuela.
Siempre que esta criatura mute, destruye la criatura o planeswalker objetivo que controla un oponente.

foreignNames.name: Chauve-souris funèbre
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {4}{B}{B} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Flash
Vol
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, détruisez une créature ciblée ou un planeswalker ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle.

foreignNames.name: Pipistrello del Lamento Funebre
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {4}{B}{B} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Lampo
Volare
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, distruggi una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio controllati da un avversario.

foreignNames.name: 哀歌コウモリ
foreignNames.text:
変容{4}{B}{B}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
瞬速
飛行
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、対戦相手がコントロールしている、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignNames.name: 장송곡 박쥐
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {4}{B}{B} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
섬광
비행
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.

foreignNames.name: Morcego do Lamento Fúnebre
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {4}{B}{B} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Lampejo
Voar
Toda vez que esta criatura sofrer mutação, destrua a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo que um oponente controla.

foreignNames.name: Нетопырь-Плакальщик
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {4}{B}{B} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Миг
Полет
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, уничтожьте целевое существо или planeswalker'а под контролем оппонента.

foreignNames.name: 悼挽蝙蝠
foreignNames.text:
合变{4}{B}{B}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
闪现
飞行
每当此生物合变时，消灭目标由对手操控的生物或鹏洛客。

foreignNames.name: 悼輓蝙蝠
foreignNames.text:
合變{4}{B}{B}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
閃現
飛行
每當此生物合變時，消滅目標由對手操控的生物或鵬洛客。

cards.originalText:
Mutate {4}{B}{B} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flash
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

cards.name: Dismal Backwater
cards.text:
Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

foreignNames.name: Tristes Gewässer
foreignNames.text:
Das Triste Gewässer kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn das Triste Gewässer ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {B}.

foreignNames.name: Laguna lúgubre
foreignNames.text:
La Laguna lúgubre entra al campo de batalla girada.
Cuando la Laguna lúgubre entre al campo de batalla, ganas 1 vida.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {B}.

foreignNames.name: Marigot lugubre
foreignNames.text:
Le Marigot lugubre arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Quand le Marigot lugubre arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B}.

foreignNames.name: Acquitrino Tetro
foreignNames.text:
L'Acquitrino Tetro entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Quando l'Acquitrino Tetro entra nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 1 punto vita.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B}.

foreignNames.name: 陰鬱な僻地
foreignNames.text:
陰鬱な僻地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
陰鬱な僻地が戦場に出たとき、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。

foreignNames.name: 음침한 소류
foreignNames.text:
음침한 소류는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
음침한 소류가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.

foreignNames.name: Remanso Funesto
foreignNames.text:
Remanso Funesto entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Remanso Funesto entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

cards.name: Divine Arrow
cards.text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
cards.flavor: Outside Drannith's walls, where collateral damage is of no concern, the Coppercoats are free to use more potent methods.

foreignNames.name: Göttlicher Pfeil
foreignNames.text: Der Göttliche Pfeil fügt einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Außerhalb der Mauern von Drannith, wo Kollateralschaden keine Rolle spielt, dürfen die Kupferjacken auch wirksamere Methoden anwenden.

foreignNames.name: Flecha divina
foreignNames.text: La Flecha divina hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Fuera de los muros de Drannith, donde a nadie preocupan los daños colaterales, las Capas de Cobre tienen libertad para emplear métodos más contundentes.

foreignNames.name: Flèche divine
foreignNames.text: La Flèche divine inflige 4 blessures à une créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: À l'extérieur des murailles de Drannith, là où les dommages collatéraux importent peu, les Capes de cuivre sont libres d'appliquer des méthodes plus radicales.

foreignNames.name: Freccia Divina
foreignNames.text: La Freccia Divina infligge 4 danni a una creatura attaccante o bloccante bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Fuori dalle mura di Drannith, dove i danni collaterali non sono un problema, le Giubbe Ramate sono libere di usare metodi più potenti.

foreignNames.name: 神聖なる矢
foreignNames.text: 攻撃クリーチャー１体かブロック・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。神聖なる矢はそれに４点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: ドラニスの壁の外では巻き添えの心配がないので、銅纏いも強力な手段が使える。

foreignNames.name: 신성한 화살
foreignNames.text: 공격 중이거나 방어 중인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 신성한 화살은 그 생물에게 피해 4점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 드라니스의 벽 밖에서는 부수적인 손상을 신경쓰지 않아도 되기에, 구리 코트들이 더 강력한 수단들을 자유롭게 사용할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Flecha Divina
foreignNames.text: Flecha Divina causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura alvo atacante ou bloqueadora.
foreignNames.flavor: Fora das muralhas de Drannith, onde os danos colaterais não são um problema, os Gibões de Cobre estão livres para usar métodos mais potentes.

foreignNames.name: Божественная Стрела
foreignNames.text: Божественная Стрела наносит 4 повреждения целевому атакующему или блокирующему существу.
foreignNames.flavor: За стенами Драннита, где о сопутствующем уроне беспокоиться не приходится, Медные Кители могут пользоваться самыми мощными методами.

foreignNames.name: 神箭穿心
foreignNames.text: 神箭穿心对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成4点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在卓尼斯的高墙之外不用担心误伤无辜，紫铜军可以自由运用更加有效的制敌手段。

foreignNames.name: 神箭穿心
foreignNames.text: 神箭穿心對目標進行攻擊或阻擋的生物造成4點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在卓尼斯的高牆之外不用擔心誤傷無辜，紫銅軍可以自由運用更加有效的制敵手段。

cards.name: Drannith Healer
cards.text:
Whenever you cycle another card, you gain 1 life.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: "The glowstones shine and dinosaurs roar to the south. Business will be brisk tonight."

rulings.text: Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them, and some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability is countered (with Disallow, for example), the other ability will still resolve.

foreignNames.flavor: "Le splendipietre brillano e i dinosauri ruggiscono verso sud. Stanotte gli affari andranno a gonfie vele."

foreignNames.flavor: "Luminólitos brilhando e dinossauros rugindo ao sul... Esta noite vai ser ótima para os meus negócios."

cards.name: Drannith Magistrate
cards.text: Your opponents can't cast spells from anywhere other than their hands.
cards.flavor: "Our sanctuaries must be beacons of reason and calm or else they will fall."

rulings.text: If an effect says that an opponent may cast a spell from anywhere other than their hand, Drannith Magistrate’s restriction overrules that permission.
If a rule or effect allows them to do so, your opponents may play lands from zones other than their hand and activate abilities of cards in zones other than their hand.
Effects may put cards from other zones onto the battlefield under an opponent’s control.

foreignNames.name: Drannithischer Magistrat
foreignNames.text: Deine Gegner können Zaubersprüche von nirgendwoher außer aus ihrer Hand wirken.
foreignNames.flavor: „Unsere Zufluchtsorte müssen Leuchtfeuer der Vernunft und der Ruhe sein, oder sie werden fallen."

foreignNames.name: Magistrado de Drannith
foreignNames.text: Tus oponentes no pueden lanzar hechizos excepto desde sus manos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nuestros santuarios deben ser faros de la razón y la calma o caerán".

foreignNames.name: Magistrat de Drannith
foreignNames.text: Vos adversaires ne peuvent lancer des sorts que depuis leurs mains.
foreignNames.flavor: « Nos sanctuaires doivent être des bastions de raison et de tranquillité, sinon ils tomberont. »

foreignNames.name: Magistrato di Drannith
foreignNames.text: I tuoi avversari non possono lanciare magie da una zona diversa dalla loro mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "I nostri santuari devono essere fari di ragionevolezza e calma, oppure cadranno."

foreignNames.name: ドラニスの判事
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手は自分の手札以外から呪文を唱えられない。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我々の聖域は使命と平穏の標でなくては滅びてしまう。」

foreignNames.name: 드라니스 판사
foreignNames.text: 당신의 상대들은 자신의 손 이외의 영역에서는 주문을 발동할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리의 성소들은 이성과 침착함의 봉화가 되어야만 해. 그렇지 않으면 무너질 거야."

foreignNames.name: Magistrado de Drannith
foreignNames.text: Seus oponentes não podem conjurar mágicas de nenhum lugar além da própria mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nossos santuários precisam ser faróis de racionalidade e calma, ou cairão."

foreignNames.name: Драннитский Магистрат
foreignNames.text: Ваши оппоненты могут разыгрывать заклинания только из своей руки.
foreignNames.flavor: «Наши убежища должны быть светочами порядка и спокойствия, иначе они падут».

foreignNames.name: 卓尼斯官员
foreignNames.text: 所有对手都不能从其手牌以外的区域施放咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们各处庇护地必须成为理性沉着的信标，否则必将败亡。」

foreignNames.name: 卓尼斯官員
foreignNames.text: 所有對手都不能從其手牌以外的區域施放咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們各處庇護地必須成為理性沉著的信標，否則必將敗亡。」

cards.name: Eerie Ultimatum
cards.text: Return any number of permanent cards with different names from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"The ground under our feet is a record of every slight against the world, to be avenged at a time of its choosing."
—Gavi, nest warden

rulings.text: A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.
You choose which permanent cards to return while Eerie Ultimatum is resolving. No player may take actions between the time you choose and the time those cards return to the battlefield.
You may choose to return just one permanent card, regardless of its name.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it enters the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.
An Aura being put onto the battlefield this way can’t enchant anything else that is being put onto the battlefield at the same time.

cards.name: Eerie Ultimatum
cards.text: Return any number of permanent cards with different names from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.
You choose which permanent cards to return while Eerie Ultimatum is resolving. No player may take actions between the time you choose and the time those cards return to the battlefield.
You may choose to return just one permanent card, regardless of its name.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it enters the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.
An Aura being put onto the battlefield this way can’t enchant anything else that is being put onto the battlefield at the same time.

cards.name: Emergent Ultimatum
cards.text: Search your library for up to three monocolored cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one of those cards. Shuffle that card into your library. You may cast the other cards without paying their mana costs. Exile Emergent Ultimatum.

rulings.text: If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
A monocolored card is exactly one of white, blue, black, red, or green and no other colors. A colorless card isn’t monocolored.
If you find only one card, you’ll shuffle it into your library and exile Emergent Ultimatum without casting anything.
If you wish to cast any exiled cards, you do so as part of the resolution of Emergent Ultimatum. You can’t wait to cast them later. Timing permissions based on a card’s type are ignored.
Emergent Ultimatum is still on the stack while you cast the cards you found, so those spells could target it. However, once it’s exiled, it will no longer be a legal target.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Cathartic Reunion, those must be paid to cast the card.

foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке не более трех одноцветных карт с различными именами и изгоните их. Оппонент выбирает одну из тех карт. Втасуйте ту карту в вашу библиотеку. Вы можете разыграть остальные карты без уплаты их мана-стоимости. Изгоните Новоявленный Ультиматум.

foreignNames.name: 突发通牒
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张名称各不相同的单色牌并将这些牌放逐。由任一对手选择其中一张。将该牌洗入你的牌库。你可以施放其余的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐突发通牒。

foreignNames.name: 突發通牒
foreignNames.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋至多三張名稱各不相同的單色牌並將這些牌放逐。由任一對手選擇其中一張。將該牌洗入你的牌庫。你可以施放其餘的牌，且不需支付其魔法力費用。放逐突發通牒。

cards.originalText: Search your library for up to three monocolored cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one of those cards. Shuffle that card into your library. You may cast the other cards without paying their mana costs. Exile Emergent Ultimatum.

cards.name: Emergent Ultimatum
cards.text: Search your library for up to three monocolored cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one of those cards. Shuffle that card into your library. You may cast the other cards without paying their mana costs. Exile Emergent Ultimatum.

rulings.text: If a spell has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
A monocolored card is exactly one of white, blue, black, red, or green and no other colors. A colorless card isn’t monocolored.
If you find only one card, you’ll shuffle it into your library and exile Emergent Ultimatum without casting anything.
If you wish to cast any exiled cards, you do so as part of the resolution of Emergent Ultimatum. You can’t wait to cast them later. Timing permissions based on a card’s type are ignored.
Emergent Ultimatum is still on the stack while you cast the cards you found, so those spells could target it. However, once it’s exiled, it will no longer be a legal target.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, such as that of Cathartic Reunion, those must be paid to cast the card.

cards.name: Escape Protocol
cards.text: Whenever you cycle a card, you may pay {1}. When you do, exile target artifact or creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
cards.flavor: Sanctuaries harnessed the glowstones' natural reaction to monsters to create a warning system.

rulings.text: While resolving Escape Protocol’s triggered ability, you can’t pay {1} multiple times to exile multiple permanents you control.

Escape Protocol’s triggered ability goes on the stack without a target. While that ability is resolving, you may pay {1}. If you do, a second ability triggers and you pick a target artifact or creature you control. This is different from abilities that say “If you do . . .” in that players may cast spells and activate abilities after mana is paid but before the target changes zones.

When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled. Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them, and some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability is countered (with Disallow, for example), the other ability will still resolve.

foreignNames.name: Fluchtprotokoll
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du eine Karte umwandelst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, schicke ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, das bzw. die du kontrollierst, ins Exil und bringe es bzw. sie dann unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Zufluchtsorte nutzen die natürliche Reaktion der Glimmsteine auf Monster als Warnsystem.

foreignNames.name: Protocolo de escapatoria

foreignNames.flavor: Los santuarios aprovecharon la reacción natural de las rocas irradialuz ante los monstruos para crear un sistema de advertencia.

foreignNames.name: Protocole d'évasion

foreignNames.flavor: Les sanctuaires ont exploité la réaction naturelle des nitescenthes face aux monstres pour en faire un système d'alerte.

foreignNames.name: Protocollo di Fuga

foreignNames.flavor: I santuari hanno sfruttato la reazione naturale delle splendipietre ai mostri per creare un sistema di allerta.

foreignNames.name: 脱出の儀礼

foreignNames.flavor: 聖域では輝き石の怪物に対する自然な反応が、警報機構の構築に利用された。

foreignNames.name: 탈출 규약

foreignNames.flavor: 성소들은 발광석이 괴수들에게 자연적으로 반응하는 것을 이용해 경고 체계로 삼았다.

foreignNames.name: Protocolo de Fuga
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você recicla um card, você pode pagar {1}. Quando fizer isso, exile o artefato ou a criatura alvo que você controla, depois devolva-o ao campo de batalha sob o controle de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Os santuários aproveitaram a reação natural dos luminólitos aos monstros para criar um sistema de alerta.

foreignNames.name: Протокол Побега

foreignNames.flavor: Используя естественную реакцию светокамня на чудовищ, в убежищах устроили систему предупреждения.

foreignNames.name: 逃离方案

cards.name: Essence Symbiote
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control mutates, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor: The Ozolith's appearance spawned a new era of wild mutation on Ikoria. Some creatures hunted different prey, lived in new habitats, and thrived on mutation itself.

rulings.text: You gain 2 life when Essence Symbiote’s ability resolves, even if you can’t put a +1/+1 counter on the mutated creature (most likely because it’s left the battlefield).
If Essence Symbiote mutates, its ability triggers.

foreignNames.name: Essenzsymbiont

foreignNames.flavor: O aparecimento do Ozólito deu início a uma nova era de mutações selvagens em Ikoria. Algumas criaturas passaram a caçar presas diferentes, a viver em novos habitats e a progredir com a própria mutação.

foreignNames.flavor: Появление Озолита породило новую волну самых безумных мутаций на Икории. Некоторые существа стали охотиться на другую добычу, жить в новом месте и в целом процветать из-за мутаций.

cards.originalText: Whenever a creature you control mutates, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Everquill Phoenix
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, create a red artifact token named Feather with "{1}, Sacrifice Feather: Return target Phoenix card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."

foreignNames.name: Immerfeder-Phoenix
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{R} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Fliegend
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, erzeuge einen roten Artefaktspielstein namens Feder mit „{1}, opfere die Feder: Bringe eine Phoenix-Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof getappt ins Spiel zurück."

foreignNames.name: Fénix plumaeterna
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {3}{R}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Vuela.
Siempre que esta criatura mute, crea una ficha de artefacto roja llamada Pluma con "{1}, sacrificar la Pluma: Regresa la carta de Fénix objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla girada".

foreignNames.name: Phénix aux plumes perpétuelles
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{R} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Vol
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, créez un jeton d'artefact rouge appelé Plume avec « {1}, sacrifiez la Plume : Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille, engagée, une carte de phénix ciblée depuis votre cimetière. »

foreignNames.name: Fenice della Piuma Eterna
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {3}{R} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Volare
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, crea una pedina artefatto rossa chiamata Piuma con "{1}, Sacrifica la Piuma: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia TAPpata una carta Fenice bersaglio dal tuo cimitero."

foreignNames.name: 永遠羽のフェニックス
foreignNames.text:
変容{3}{R}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
飛行
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、「羽根」という名前で「{1}, 羽根を生け贄に捧げる：あなたの墓地からフェニックス・カード１枚を対象とし、それをタップ状態で戦場に戻す。」を持つ赤のアーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。

foreignNames.name: 영원깃털 불사조
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {3}{R} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
비행
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 이름이 깃털이며 "{1}, 깃털을 희생한다: 당신의 무덤에 있는 불사조 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 탭된 채로 전장으로 되돌린다."를 가진 적색 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignNames.name: Fênix Plumeterna
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {3}{R} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Voar
Toda vez que esta criatura sofrer mutação, crie uma ficha de artefato vermelho com o nome Pluma com "{1}, sacrifique Pluma: Devolva o card de Fênix alvo de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha virado."

foreignNames.name: Феникс Вечного Пера
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {3}{R} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Полет
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, создайте одну фишку красного артефакта с именем Перо и способностью «{1}, пожертвуйте Перо: верните целевую карту Феникса из вашего кладбища на поле битвы повернутой».

foreignNames.name: 恒羽凤凰
foreignNames.text:
合变{3}{R}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
飞行
每当此生物合变时，派出一个名称为翎羽的红色衍生神器，此神器具有「{1}，牺牲翎羽：将目标凤凰牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。」

foreignNames.name: 恆羽鳳凰
foreignNames.text:
合變{3}{R}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
飛行
每當此生物合變時，派出一個名稱為翎羽的紅色衍生神器，此神器具有「{1}，犧牲翎羽：將目標鳳凰牌從你的墳墓場橫置移回戰場。」

cards.originalText:
Mutate {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, create a red artifact token named Feather with "{1}, Sacrifice Feather: Return target Phoenix card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."

cards.name: Everquill Phoenix
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, create a red artifact token named Feather with "{1}, Sacrifice Feather: Return target Phoenix card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."

cards.name: Everquill Phoenix
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{R} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flying
Whenever this creature mutates, create a red artifact token named Feather with "{1}, Sacrifice Feather: Return target Phoenix card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."

foreignNames.name: Immerfeder-Phoenix
foreignNames.flavor: Destoroyah, perfekte Lebensform

foreignNames.name: Fénix plumaeterna
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {3}{R}.
Vuela.
Siempre que esta criatura mute, crea una ficha de artefacto roja llamada Pluma con "{1}, sacrificar la Pluma: Regresa la carta de Fénix objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla girada".
foreignNames.flavor: Destoroyah, ser perfecto

foreignNames.name: Phénix aux plumes perpétuelles
foreignNames.flavor: Destoroyah, forme de vie parfaite

foreignNames.name: Fenice della Piuma Eterna
foreignNames.flavor: Destoroyah, Forma di Vita Perfetta

foreignNames.name: 永遠羽のフェニックス
foreignNames.flavor: 完（かん）全（ぜん）生（せい）命（めい）体（たい）、デストロイア

foreignNames.name: 영원깃털 불사조
foreignNames.flavor: 완벽한 생명체, 디스트로이아

foreignNames.name: Fênix Plumeterna
foreignNames.flavor: Destoroyah, Forma de Vida Perfeita

foreignNames.name: Феникс Вечного Пера
foreignNames.flavor: Разрушитель, Идеальное Существо

foreignNames.name: 恒羽凤凰
foreignNames.flavor: 完全生命体戴斯特洛伊亚

foreignNames.name: 恆羽鳳凰
foreignNames.flavor: 完全生命體戴斯特洛伊亞

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"It's not hard to grasp that this land does not belong to us."
—Gavi, nest waren

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische dann deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Es ist nicht schwer zu begreifen, dass dieses Land nicht uns gehört."
—Gavi die Nesthüterin

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor:
"No es difícil entender que esta tierra no nos pertenece".
—Gavi, guardiana del nido

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Il est facile de comprendre que ce monde ne nous appartient pas. »
—Gavi, garde du nid

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Non è difficile comprendere che questa terra non ci appartiene."
—Gavi, guardiana del nido

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor:
「この土地が私たちに属していないことくらい簡単に分かるわ。」
――巣守り、ガヴィ

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"이 땅이 우리 것이 아니라는 건 그리 어렵지 않게 알아차릴 수 있지."
—둥지 관리인, 가비

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Não é tão difícil entender que esta terra não nos pertence."
— Gavi, guardiã do ninho

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Понять, что эта земля принадлежит не нам, совсем не сложно».
— Гави, охранница гнезда

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「不难看出这片大地并未属于我们。」
～巢穴护卫盖薇

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「不難看出這片大地並未屬於我們。」
～巢穴護衛蓋薇

cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Excavation Mole
cards.text:
Trample
When Excavation Mole enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
cards.flavor: It makes molehills out of mountains.

foreignNames.name: Ausgrabungsmaulwurf
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Ausgrabungsmaulwurf ins Spiel kommt, lege die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek auf deinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Er verwandelt Berge in Maulwurfshügel.

foreignNames.name: Topo de la excavación
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando el Topo de la excavación entre al campo de batalla, pon las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: Convierte montañas en toperas.

foreignNames.name: Taupe d'excavation
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement
Quand la Taupe d'excavation arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Ses taupinières sont grandes comme des montagnes.

foreignNames.name: Talpa da Escavazione
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere
Quando la Talpa da Escavazione entra nel campo di battaglia, metti nel tuo cimitero le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Riduce le montagne a granelli di sabbia.

foreignNames.name: 掘削モグラ
foreignNames.text:
トランプル
掘削モグラが戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを３枚あなたの墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: それは山からモグラ塚を作る。

foreignNames.name: 굴착 두더지
foreignNames.text:
돌진
굴착 두더지가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그것은 산으로 두둑을 만든다.

foreignNames.name: Toupeira de Escavação
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar
Quando Toupeira de Escavação entrar no campo de batalha, coloque os três cards do topo de seu grimório em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Ela faz das montanhas suas tocas.

foreignNames.name: Крот-Раскапыватель
foreignNames.text:
Пробивной удар
Когда Крот-Раскапыватель выходит на поле битвы, положите три верхние карты вашей библиотеки на ваше кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: Он из гор делает кротовьи холмики.

foreignNames.name: 掘地鼹鼠
foreignNames.text:
践踏
当掘地鼹鼠进战场时，将你牌库顶的三张牌置入你的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 它在高山之上打出鼹丘。

foreignNames.name: 掘地鼴鼠
foreignNames.text:
踐踏
當掘地鼴鼠進戰場時，將你牌庫頂的三張牌置入你的墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 牠在高山之上打出鼴丘。

cards.originalText:
Trample
When Excavation Mole enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

cards.name: Extinction Event
cards.text: Choose odd or even. Exile each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value. (Zero is even.)

rulings.text: You choose odd or even while Extinction Event is resolving. Players can’t take any actions between the time you make that choice and the time some creatures go extinct.
If a creature on the battlefield has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The converted mana cost of a token that isn’t a copy of another object is 0. A token that is a copy of another object has the same mana cost as that object.

cards.name: Extinction Event
cards.text: Choose odd or even. Exile each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value. (Zero is even.)
cards.flavor:
"Nature is more merciless than any hunter I've ever known."
—Zai, nightsquad captain

rulings.text: You choose odd or even while Extinction Event is resolving. Players can’t take any actions between the time you make that choice and the time some creatures go extinct.
If a creature on the battlefield has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The converted mana cost of a token that isn’t a copy of another object is 0. A token that is a copy of another object has the same mana cost as that object.

foreignNames.name: Massenaussterben
foreignNames.text: Bestimme gerade oder ungerade. Schicke alle Kreaturen, deren umgewandelte Manakosten dem bestimmten Merkmal entsprechen, ins Exil. (Null zählt als gerade.)
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Natur ist gnadenloser als jeder Jäger, den ich je kannte."
—Zai, Hauptmann der Nachtwache

foreignNames.name: Acontecimiento de extinción
foreignNames.text: Elige par o impar. Exilia cada criatura con coste de maná convertido del valor elegido. (Cero es par.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"La naturaleza es más despiadada que cualquier cazador que haya conocido".
—Zai, capitán de la brigada nocturna

foreignNames.name: Événement d'extinction
foreignNames.text: Choisissez pair ou impair. Exilez chaque créature ayant un coût converti de mana de la valeur choisie. (Zéro est pair.)
foreignNames.flavor:
« La nature est moins clémente que tous les chasseurs que j'ai pu connaître. »
—Zaï, capitaine de l'escouade nocturne

foreignNames.name: Evento di Estinzione
foreignNames.text: Scegli pari o dispari. Esilia ogni creatura con il costo di mana convertito scelto. (0 è pari.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"La natura è più spietata di qualsiasi cacciatore che abbia mai conosciuto."
—Zai, capitano dello squadrone notturno

foreignNames.name: 絶滅の契機
foreignNames.text: 奇数か偶数を選ぶ。点数で見たマナ・コストがその選ばれた値である各クリーチャーをそれぞれ追放する。（０は偶数である。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「自然は私の知るどんな狩人よりも無慈悲だ。」
――夜勤隊長、ザイ

foreignNames.name: 멸종 사건
foreignNames.text: 홀수 또는 짝수를 선택한다. 선택한 값과 같은 전환마나비용을 가진 각 생물을 추방한다. (0은 짝수로 취급한다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"자연이야말로 내가 알고 있는 그 어떤 사냥꾼보다도 가차없지."
—밤 부대 대장, 자이

foreignNames.name: Evento de Extinção
foreignNames.text: Escolha par ou ímpar. Exile cada criatura com custo de mana convertido do valor escolhido. (Zero é par.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"A natureza é mais impiedosa do que qualquer caçador que eu conheça."
— Zai, capitão do esquadrão noturno

foreignNames.name: Вымирание
foreignNames.text: Выберите чет или нечет. Изгоните каждое существо с конвертированной мана-стоимостью, соответствующей выбранному значению. (Ноль является четным числом.)
foreignNames.flavor:
«Природа безжалостнее любого охотника, которого я знаю».
— Зей, капитан ночного отряда

foreignNames.name: 生灵绝灭
foreignNames.text: 选择奇数或偶数。放逐所有总法术力费用是该种数值的生物。（零是偶数。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「大自然比我认识的所有猎人都要无情。」
～夜班队长泽耶

foreignNames.name: 生靈絕滅
foreignNames.text: 選擇奇數或偶數。放逐所有總魔法力費用是該種數值的生物。（零是偶數。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「大自然比我認識的所有獵人都要無情。」
～夜班隊長澤耶

cards.originalText: Choose odd or even. Exile each creature with converted mana cost of the chosen value. (Zero is even.)

cards.name: Exuberant Wolfbear
cards.text: Whenever Exuberant Wolfbear attacks, you may change the base power and toughness of target Human you control to Exuberant Wolfbear's power and toughness until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes the *eludha* is a sacred harmony of souls. Sometimes a bonder grabs some fur and holds on tight.

rulings.text: Exuberant Wolfbear’s power and toughness are unaffected when the target Human takes on those values.
You choose whether the Human’s base power and toughness change as the ability resolves, not as the ability is put onto the stack.

Any effects that modify the Human’s power and/or toughness without setting them to a specific number or value will apply after its base power and toughness are set, regardless of the order in which those effects were created. The same is true of counters that modify its power and toughness.

The Human’s new base power and toughness are set to Exuberant Wolfbear’s actual power and toughness, not just its base power and toughness. If Exuberant Wolfbear’s power or toughness changes later in the turn, the Human isn’t affected.

If Exuberant Wolfbear leaves the battlefield while its triggered ability is on the stack, use its power and toughness as it last existed on the battlefield to determine the Human’s new base power and toughness.

foreignNames.name: Unbändiger Wolfsbär
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn der Unbändige Wolfsbär angreift, kannst du bis zum Ende des Zuges die Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft eines Menschen deiner Wahl, den du kontrollierst, zur Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Unbändigen Wolfsbären ändern.
foreignNames.flavor: Manchmal ist *Eludha* eine heilige Harmonie der Seelen. Manchmal greift der Bynder etwas Fell und hält sich daran fest.

foreignNames.name: Loboso vehemente
foreignNames.text: Siempre que el Loboso vehemente ataque, puedes cambiar la fuerza y la resistencia base del Humano objetivo que controlas por la fuerza y la resistencia del Loboso vehemente hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Algunas veces, la *eludha* es una armonía sagrada de almas. Otras, el vinculador se agarra muy fuerte al pelaje.

foreignNames.name: Lupours exubérant
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que le Lupours exubérant attaque, vous pouvez remplacer la force et l'endurance de base d'un humain ciblé que vous contrôlez par la force et l'endurance du Lupours exubérant jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Parfois, l'*éludha* est une harmonie sacrée entre deux âmes. Mais parfois, le brideur se contente d'attraper un peu de fourrure et de s'y accrocher fermement.

foreignNames.name: Luporso Esuberante
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta il Luporso Esuberante attacca, puoi cambiare la forza e la costituzione base di un Umano bersaglio che controlli nella forza e costituzione del Luporso Esuberante fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: A volte, l'*eludha* è una sacra armonia di anime. Altre volte, il vincolatore afferra una pelliccia e si regge forte.

foreignNames.name: 溌剌とした狼熊
foreignNames.text: 溌剌とした狼熊が攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールしている人間１体を対象とする。あなたは「ターン終了時まで、それの基本のパワーとタフネスを、溌剌とした狼熊のパワーとタフネスに変更する。」を選んでもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: *エルーダ*とは、ときに魂の聖なる調和である。眷者とは、ときに毛皮にしがみつく者である。

foreignNames.name: 활기 넘치는 늑대곰
foreignNames.text: 활기 넘치는 늑대곰이 공격할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 인간을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 턴종료까지 그 인간의 기본 공격력 및 방어력을 활기 넘치는 늑대곰의 공격력 및 방어력으로 변경할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 때로는 *엘루다*가 영혼들의 신성한 조화를 의미한다. 때로는 유대자가 털가죽을 붙잡고 놓치지 않게 꼭 쥐어야 한다.

foreignNames.name: Loburso Exuberante
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que Loburso Exuberante ataca, você pode permutar o poder e a resistência básicos do Humano alvo que você controla com os de Loburso Exuberante até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Às vezes, a *eludha* é uma harmonia sagrada entre almas. Às vezes, o vinculador só se agarra firme no pelo e vai.

foreignNames.name: Неудержимый Медведеволк
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда Неудержимый Медведеволк атакует, вы можете обменять значения базовой силы и выносливости целевого Человека под вашим контролем на силу и выносливость Неудержимого Медведеволка до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Иногда *элудха* — это священная гармония душ. А иногда узомант просто хватается за шкуру и старается не свалиться.

foreignNames.name: 亢奋狼熊
foreignNames.text: 每当亢奋狼熊攻击时，你可以将目标由你操控之人类生物的基础力量与防御力更改为亢奋狼熊的力量与防御力直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些时候，*灵绊*是靠心灵之间神圣共鸣来维系。而有些时候，则是靠持绊人抓紧坐稳来维持。

foreignNames.name: 亢奮狼熊
foreignNames.text: 每當亢奮狼熊攻擊時，你可以將目標由你操控之人類生物的基礎力量與防禦力更改為亢奮狼熊的力量與防禦力直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 有些時候，*靈絆*是靠心靈之間神聖共鳴來維繫。而有些時候，則是靠持絆人抓緊坐穩來維持。

cards.originalText: Whenever Exuberant Wolfbear attacks, you may change the base power and toughness of target Human you control to Exuberant Wolfbear's power and toughness until end of turn.

cards.name: Facet Reader
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: "Every flaw in the crystal represents a moment where our strategy might go wrong."

rulings.text: You draw a card and discard a card all while Facet Reader’s ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

foreignNames.name: Facettenleser
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Jeder Makel in einem Kristall repräsentiert einen möglichen Augenblick des Scheiterns."

foreignNames.name: Lector de facetas
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cada defecto en el cristal es un momento en el que nuestra estrategia podría salir mal".

foreignNames.name: Lecteur de facettes
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Chaque imperfection du cristal représente un instant où notre stratégie pourrait échouer. »

foreignNames.name: Indovino delle Sfaccettature
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ogni difetto nel cristallo rappresenta un momento in cui la nostra strategia potrebbe andare storta."

foreignNames.name: 切子読み
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}：カードを１枚引き、その後カード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「水晶の中の亀裂ひとつひとつが、我々の戦略が崩れる可能性のある瞬間を示している。」

foreignNames.name: 보석 점쟁이
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "수정 속에 있는 흠 하나하나가 우리의 전략이 잘못될 수도 있는 순간들을 나타내지요."

foreignNames.name: Leitor de Facetas
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: Compre um card e depois descarte um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Toda imperfeição no cristal representa um momento em que sua estratégia pode dar errado."

foreignNames.name: Чтец Граней
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}: возьмите карту, затем сбросьте карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Каждый изъян в кристалле — это момент, когда наша стратегия может не сработать».

foreignNames.name: 片晶究研师
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「水晶的每处瑕疵，都代表我们战略中可能存在的错误。」

foreignNames.name: 片晶究研師
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}：抽一張牌，然後棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「水晶的每處瑕疵，都代表我們戰略中可能存在的錯誤。」

cards.originalText: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

cards.name: Farfinder
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Farfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "Take us home," she whispered, and the fox's eyes began to glow.

foreignNames.name: Fernensucher
foreignNames.text:
Wachsamkeit
Wenn der Fernensucher ins Spiel kommt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte durchsuchen, sie offen vorzeigen, auf deine Hand nehmen und dann deine Bibliothek mischen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Führe uns nach Hause", flüsterte sie und die Augen des Fuchses begannen zu glühen.

foreignNames.name: Descubridora
foreignNames.text:
Vigilancia.
Cuando la Descubridora entre al campo de batalla, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, mostrarla, ponerla en tu mano y luego barajar tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: "Llévanos a casa", susurró, y los ojos de la raposa empezaron a brillar.

foreignNames.name: Traqueloin
foreignNames.text:
Vigilance
Quand le Traqueloin arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, la révéler, la mettre dans votre main et mélanger ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ramène-nous », chuchota-t-elle, et les yeux du renard se mirent à briller.

foreignNames.name: Scovadistanze
foreignNames.text:
Cautela
Quando lo Scovadistanze entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, rivelarla, aggiungerla alla tua mano e poi rimescolare il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Portaci a casa", sussurrò la vincolatrice e gli occhi della volpe si illuminarono.

foreignNames.name: 彼方見
foreignNames.text:
警戒
彼方見が戦場に出たとき、あなたは「あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、公開し、あなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。」を選んでもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 「家まで連れて行って。」と彼女が囁くと、狐の目が光り出した。

foreignNames.name: 원격탐색꾼
foreignNames.text:
경계
원격탐색꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 공개한 후, 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "집으로 데려가 줘," 그녀가 속삭이자, 여우의 눈이 빛을 발하기 시작했다.

foreignNames.name: Encontra-terras
foreignNames.text:
Vigilância
Quando Encontra-terras entra no campo de batalha, você pode procurar um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, revelá-lo, colocá-lo na sua mão e depois embaralhar seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: "Leve-nos para casa", sussurrou ela, e os olhos da raposa começaram a brilhar.

foreignNames.name: Ищейка
foreignNames.text:
Бдительность
Когда Ищейка выходит на поле битвы, вы можете найти в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, показать ее, положить ее в вашу руку, затем перетасовать вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: «Отведи нас домой», — прошептала она, и глаза лисицы засветились.

foreignNames.name: 识途灵狐
foreignNames.text:
警戒
当识途灵狐进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「带我们回家，」她低语道，狐狸的眼中随即闪出一丝亮光。

foreignNames.name: 識途靈狐
foreignNames.text:
警戒
當識途靈狐進戰場時，你可以從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「帶我們回家，」她低語道，狐狸的眼中隨即閃出一絲亮光。

cards.originalText:
Vigilance
When Farfinder enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Ferocious Tigorilla
cards.text: Ferocious Tigorilla enters the battlefield with your choice of a trample counter or a menace counter on it. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor: From a certain perspective, it's an inspiring story of overcoming obstacles.

foreignNames.name: Wilder Tigorilla
foreignNames.text: Der Wilde Tigorilla kommt mit einer Trampelschaden- oder einer Bedrohlich-Marke ins Spiel (du entscheidest). (Eine Kreatur mit Bedrohlichkeit kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
foreignNames.flavor: Aus einer bestimmten Perspektive ist es eine inspirierende Geschichte über die Überwindung von Hindernissen.

foreignNames.name: Tigrerila feroz
foreignNames.text: El Tigrerila feroz entra al campo de batalla con lo que elijas sobre él: un contador de arrollar o un contador de amenaza. (Una criatura con la habilidad de amenaza no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
foreignNames.flavor: Desde cierta perspectiva, es una historia inspiradora sobre la superación de obstáculos.

foreignNames.name: Tigrorille féroce
foreignNames.text: Le Tigrorille féroce arrive sur le champ de bataille avec, selon votre choix, un marqueur « piétinement » ou un marqueur « menace » sur lui. (Une créature avec la menace ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
foreignNames.flavor: D'une certaine façon, cette histoire est un beau message d'inspiration pour surmonter les obstacles.

foreignNames.name: Tigrorilla Feroce
foreignNames.text: Il Tigrorilla Feroce entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino travolgere o un segnalino minacciare a tua scelta. (Una creatura con minacciare non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
foreignNames.flavor: In un certo senso, la sua è una storia ispiratrice che insegna a superare qualsiasi ostacolo.

foreignNames.name: 獰猛なゴリトラ
foreignNames.text: 獰猛なゴリトラは、トランプル・カウンター１個か威迫カウンター１個のうちあなたが選んだ１つが置かれた状態で戦場に出る。（威迫を持つクリーチャーは、２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 見方を変えれば、これは障壁を乗り越える感動の物語だ。

foreignNames.name: 흉포한 호릴라
foreignNames.text: 흉포한 호릴라는 돌진 카운터 또는 호전적 카운터 중 당신이 선택한 카운터를 가지고 전장에 들어온다. (호전적이 있는 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물로만 방어할 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 특정한 관점에서 보면, 그건 장애물을 극복하는 인상적인 이야기이다.

foreignNames.name: Tigrorila Feroz
foreignNames.text: Tigrorila Feroz entra no campo de batalha com um marcador de atropelar ou um marcador de ameaçar, à sua escolha. (Uma criatura com ameaçar só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)
foreignNames.flavor: De certo ponto de vista, é uma inspiradora história de superação.

foreignNames.name: Яростная Тигорилла
foreignNames.text: Яростная Тигорилла выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном Пробивного удара или одним жетоном Угрозы на ней по вашему выбору. (Существо с Угрозой не может быть заблокировано менее чем двумя существами.)
foreignNames.flavor: С определенной точки зрения, это вдохновляющая история о преодолении препятствий.

foreignNames.name: 凶猛虎猿
foreignNames.text: 凶猛虎猿进战场时上面依你的选择有一个践踏指示物或一个威慑指示物。（具威慑异能的生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）
foreignNames.flavor: 从某种角度来说，这是一个不畏艰辛克服万难的励志故事。

foreignNames.name: 兇猛虎猿
foreignNames.text: 兇猛虎猿進戰場時上面依你的選擇有一個踐踏指示物或一個威懾指示物。（具威懾異能的生物只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）
foreignNames.flavor: 從某種角度來說，這是一個不畏艱辛克服萬難的勵志故事。

cards.originalText: Ferocious Tigorilla enters the battlefield with your choice of a trample counter or a menace counter on it. (A creature with menace can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Fertilid
cards.text:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

rulings.text: Although the targeted player doesn’t need to find a basic land card if they don’t want to, that player must shuffle their library.

foreignNames.name: Ergiebigmacher
foreignNames.text:
Der Ergiebigmacher kommt mit zwei +1/+1-Marken ins Spiel.
{1}{G}, entferne eine +1/+1-Marke vom Ergiebigmacher: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl durchsucht seine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringt sie getappt ins Spiel und mischt dann seine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Fertílido
foreignNames.text:
El Fertílido entra al campo de batalla con dos contadores +1/+1 sobre él.
{1}{G}, remover un contador +1/+1 del Fertílido: El jugador objetivo busca en su biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, la pone en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja su biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Fertilide
foreignNames.text:
Le Fertilide arrive sur le champ de bataille avec deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur lui.
{1}{G}, retirez un marqueur +1/+1 du Fertilide : Le joueur ciblé cherche dans sa bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, la met sur le champ de bataille engagée, et mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Fertilid
foreignNames.text:
Il Fertilid entra nel campo di battaglia con due segnalini +1/+1.
{1}{G}, Rimuovi un segnalino +1/+1 dal Fertilid: Un giocatore bersaglio passa in rassegna il suo grimorio per una carta terra base, la mette sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola il suo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: ファーティリド
foreignNames.text:
ファーティリドは、＋１/＋１カウンターが２個置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
{1}{G}, ファーティリドの上から＋１/＋１カウンターを１個取り除く：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出し、その後自分のライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 퍼틸리드
foreignNames.text:
퍼틸리드는 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.
{1}{G}, 퍼틸리드에서 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 제거한다: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 자신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Fertilídio
foreignNames.text:
Fertilídio entra no campo de batalha com dois marcadores +1/+1.
{1}{G}, remova um marcador +1/+1 de Fertilídio: O jogador alvo procura no próprio grimório um card de terreno básico, coloca-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralha o próprio grimório.

foreignNames.name: Фертилид
foreignNames.text:
Фертилид выходит на поле битвы с двумя жетонами +1/+1 на нем.
{1}{G}, удалите один жетон +1/+1 с Фертилида: целевой игрок находит в своей библиотеке карту базовой земли, кладет ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем тасует свою библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 沃壤灵
foreignNames.text:
沃壤灵进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。
{1}{G}，从沃壤灵上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标牌手从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 沃壤靈
foreignNames.text:
沃壤靈進戰場時上面有兩個+1/+1指示物。
{1}{G}，從沃壤靈上移去一個+1/+1指示物：目標玩家從其牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將其牌庫洗牌。

cards.originalText:
Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

cards.name: Fiend Artisan
cards.text:
Fiend Artisan gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

rulings.text: Fiend Artisan’s first ability applies only while it’s on the battlefield.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Fiend Artisan may become lethal if creature cards leave your graveyard during that turn.
If a card in a player’s library has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

foreignNames.name: Handwerker des Bösen
foreignNames.text:
Der Handwerker des Bösen erhält +1/+1 für jede Kreaturenkarte in deinem Friedhof.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, opfere eine andere Kreatur: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Kreaturenkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von X oder weniger, bringe sie ins Spiel und mische dann deine Bibliothek. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei wirken könntest.

foreignNames.name: Elaborademonios
foreignNames.text:
La Elaborademonios obtiene +1/+1 por cada carta de criatura en tu cementerio.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, sacrificar otra criatura: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de criatura con coste de maná convertido de X o menos, ponla en el campo de batalla y luego baraja tu biblioteca. Activa esta habilidad solo cuando puedas lanzar un conjuro.

foreignNames.name: Artisan fielleux
foreignNames.text:
L'Artisan fielleux gagne +1/+1 pour chaque carte de créature dans votre cimetière.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, sacrifiez une autre créature : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à X, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille, et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque. N'activez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.

foreignNames.name: Artigiano Immondo
foreignNames.text:
L'Artigiano Immondo prende +1/+1 per ogni carta creatura nel tuo cimitero.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, Sacrifica un'altra creatura: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta creatura con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a X, mettila sul campo di battaglia, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio. Attiva questa abilità solo quando potresti lanciare una stregoneria.

foreignNames.name: 悪魔の職工
foreignNames.text:
悪魔の職工は、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚につき＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
{X}{B/G}, {T}, 他のクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから、点数で見たマナ・コストがＸ以下のクリーチャー・カード１枚を探し、戦場に出し、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーを唱えられるときにのみ起動できる。

foreignNames.name: 마귀 장인
foreignNames.text:
마귀 장인은 당신의 무덤에 있는 각 생물 카드마다 +1/+1을 받는다.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, 다른 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 전환마나비용이 X 이하인 생물 카드 한 장을 찾아, 그 카드를 전장에 놓은 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다. 당신이 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Artesão Demoníaco
foreignNames.text:
Artesão Demoníaco recebe +1/+1 para cada card de criatura em seu cemitério.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, sacrifique outra criatura: Procure em seu grimório um card de criatura com custo de mana convertido igual ou inferior a X, coloque-o no campo de batalha e depois embaralhe seu grimório. Ative esta habilidade somente nos momentos em que poderia conjurar um feitiço.

foreignNames.name: Нечестивый Мастеровой
foreignNames.text:
Нечестивый Мастеровой получает +1/+1 за каждую карту существа на вашем кладбище.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, пожертвуйте другое существо: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту существа с конвертированной мана-стоимостью Х или меньше, положите ее на поле битвы, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку. Активируйте эту способность только при возможности разыгрывать волшебство.

foreignNames.name: 塑生邪魔
foreignNames.text:
你坟墓场中每有一张生物牌，塑生邪魔便得+1/+1。
{X}{B/G}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于X的生物牌，将之放进战场，然后将你的牌库洗牌。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。

foreignNames.name: 塑生邪魔
foreignNames.text:
你墳墓場中每有一張生物牌，塑生邪魔便得+1/+1。
{X}{B/G}，{T}，犧牲另一個生物：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張總魔法力費用等於或小於X的生物牌，將之放進戰場，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。只可以於你能施放巫術的時機下起動此異能。

{X}{BG}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Fiend Artisan
cards.text:
Fiend Artisan gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{X}{B/G}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

rulings.text: Fiend Artisan’s first ability applies only while it’s on the battlefield.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Fiend Artisan may become lethal if creature cards leave your graveyard during that turn.
If a card in a player’s library has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

cards.name: Fight as One
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Target Human creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.
• Target non-Human creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Zusammen kämpfen
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines oder beides —
• Eine Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, erhält +1/+1 und Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.
• Eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, erhält +1/+1 und Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Luchar como uno
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno o ambos:
• La criatura objetivo Humano que controlas obtiene +1/+1 y gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno.
• La criatura objetivo que no sea Humano que controlas obtiene +1/+1 y gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Ne faire qu'un au combat
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un ou les deux —
• La créature Humain ciblée que vous contrôlez gagne +1/+1 et acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.
• La créature non-Humain ciblée que vous contrôlez gagne +1/+1 et acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Combattere Uniti

cards.name: Flame Spill
cards.text: Flame Spill deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
cards.flavor: Fragile, floating Skysail suddenly seemed like an appealingly safe place to live.

rulings.text: Excess damage caused by a spell or ability is similar to how combat damage from a creature with trample is handled. Start with the amount of damage being dealt to the creature and determine what is “lethal.” This is the creature’s toughness minus the amount of damage that it already has marked on it, but ignoring any replacement or prevention effects that will modify this damage. Also ignore whether the creature has an ability such as indestructible that will result in it not being destroyed by this damage.
Once you’ve determined how much damage is excess, Flame Spill simultaneously deals damage to the creature and to its controller. This damage may be modified by replacement or prevention effects.
If the target creature is an illegal target by the time Flame Spill tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve. It won’t deal damage to any player.

cards.name: Flourishing Fox
cards.text:
Whenever you cycle another card, put a +1/+1 counter on Flourishing Fox.
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor:
"Day 1: These fox pups have really taken to me.
"Day 4: Big. So big. Need additional security."
—Jonald, mission naturalist, research notes

rulings.text: Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them, and some cards have an ability that triggers whenever you cycle any card. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability is countered (with Disallow, for example), the other ability will still resolve.

cards.name: Forbidden Friendship
cards.text: Create a 1/1 red Dinosaur creature token with haste and a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor: The two looked at each other, and neither fled. "I see," the soldier murmured. "We're both just fighting for survival out here, aren't we?"

foreignNames.name: Verbotene Freundschaft
foreignNames.text: Erzeuge einen 1/1 roten Dinosaurier-Kreaturenspielstein mit Eile und einen 1/1 weißen Mensch-Soldat-Kreaturenspielstein.
foreignNames.flavor: Die beiden blickten sich ohne Furcht an. „Ich verstehe", murmelte der Soldat. „Wir beide kämpfen hier draußen nur ums Überleben, nicht wahr?"

foreignNames.name: Amistad prohibida
foreignNames.text: Crea una ficha de criatura Dinosaurio roja 1/1 con la habilidad de prisa y una ficha de criatura Soldado Humano blanca 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: Se miraron el uno al otro y ninguno huyó. "Ya veo", murmuró el soldado. "Los dos luchamos por sobrevivir, nada más, ¿verdad?".

foreignNames.name: Amitié interdite
foreignNames.text: Créez un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Dinosaure avec la célérité et un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Humain et Soldat.
foreignNames.flavor: Ils se regardèrent, mais aucun ne prit la fuite. « Je vois, » murmura le soldat. « Nous essayons tous les deux de survivre, tout simplement, n'est-ce pas ? »

foreignNames.name: Amicizia Proibita
foreignNames.text: Crea una pedina creatura Dinosauro 1/1 rossa con rapidità e una pedina creatura Soldato Umano 1/1 bianca.
foreignNames.flavor: I due si guardarono e nessuno di loro fuggì. "Capisco", mormorò il soldato. "Entrambi stiamo solo lottando per sopravvivere qua fuori, giusto?"

foreignNames.name: 禁じられた友情
foreignNames.text: 速攻を持つ赤の１/１の恐竜・クリーチャー・トークンを１体と、白の１/１の人間・兵士・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.flavor: どちらも互いを見て、逃げることはしなかった。「そうか。」と兵士はつぶやいた。「俺たちはただここで生き残るために戦っているだけなんだよな。」

foreignNames.name: 금지된 우정
foreignNames.text: 신속을 가진 1/1 적색 공룡 생물 토큰 한 개 및 1/1 백색 인간 병사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 둘은 서로를 바라보았고, 어느 쪽도 도망가지 않았다. "알겠어," 병사가 중얼거렸다. "우리 둘 다 여기서 살아남으려고 싸우고 있는 거지, 안 그래?"

foreignNames.name: Amizade Proibida
foreignNames.text: Crie uma ficha de criatura vermelha 1/1 do tipo Dinossauro com ímpeto e uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Humano Soldado.
foreignNames.flavor: Os dois se entreolharam e nenhum deles fugiu. "Entendo", murmurou o soldado. "Estamos ambos só lutando para sobreviver por aqui, não é?"

foreignNames.name: Запретная Дружба
foreignNames.text: Создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 красный Динозавр с Ускорением и одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Человек Солдат.
foreignNames.flavor: Двое посмотрели друг на друга, но ни один не побежал. «Понимаю, — проговорил солдат. — Мы оба лишь сражаемся за выживание, не так ли?»
