cards.name: Frenzied Raptor
cards.flavor:
"Though the road through Raugrin is lined with alarm crystals, some monsters seem to be adapting. We've had raptors feigning attacks on provision caravans, while others try to sneak through the lava curtain."
—Dol, Lavabrink quartermaster

foreignNames.name: Tobsüchtiger Raptor
foreignNames.flavor:
„Auch wenn den Weg durch Raugrin Alarmkristalle säumen, scheinen sich einige Monster anzupassen. Wir hatten Raptoren, die Angriffe auf Versorgungskarawanen vortäuschten, während andere versuchten, durch den Lavavorhang zu schlüpfen."
—Dol, Lavagrund-Quartiermeister

foreignNames.name: Ráptor enloquecido
foreignNames.flavor:
"Aunque la carretera de Raugrin está flanqueada por cristales de alarma, algunos monstruos parecen estar adaptándose. Hubo ráptores que fingieron ataques a caravanas de provisiones, mientras que otros trataban de cruzar a hurtadillas la cortina de lava".
—Dol, intendente de Bordelava

foreignNames.name: Raptor hystérique
foreignNames.flavor:
« La route qui traverse Raugrin a beau être jonchée de cristaux d'avertissement, certains monstres semblent s'adapter. Des raptors ont simulé des attaques sur des caravanes de provisions pendant que d'autres ont essayé de traverser le rideau de lave. »
—Dol, quartier-maître de Bourg-sur-Lave

foreignNames.name: Raptor Frenetico
foreignNames.flavor:
"La strada che attraversa Raugrin è costellata di cristalli d'allarme, ma vari mostri sembrano essersi adattati. Alcuni raptor hanno simulato attacchi a carovane di provviste, mentre altri tentavano di oltrepassare la barriera di lava."
—Dol, quartiermastro di Lavariva

foreignNames.name: 激情の猛竜
foreignNames.flavor:
「ラウグリンを抜ける道には警報水晶が並んでいるが、一部の怪物はこれに順応しているようだ。一部の猛竜が補給隊に攻撃するふりをしている間に、他の猛竜が溶岩幕をくぐり抜けようとしたという報告がある。」
――ラバブリンクの補給士官、ダール

foreignNames.name: 광분한 랩터
foreignNames.flavor:
"라우그린까지 연결되어 있는 길에는 경보 수정들이 줄지어 서 있지만, 몇몇 괴수들이 적응하고 있는 것처럼 보인다. 보급 상단을 공격하는 것처럼 가장하면서, 다른 녀석들이 용암 장막 사이로 숨어들려고 한 랩터들이 있었지."
—용암가장자리 병참 장교, 달

foreignNames.name: Raptor Frenético
foreignNames.flavor:
"Embora a estrada que atravessa Raugrin esteja repleta de cristais de alarme, alguns monstros parecem estar se adaptando. Já vimos raptores fingindo atacar caravanas de provisões enquanto outros tentam se esgueirar pela cortina de lava."
— Dol, intendente de Beiralava

foreignNames.name: Разъяренный Раптор
foreignNames.flavor:
«По обочине дороги через Раугрин стоят кристаллы, предупреждающие об опасности, но некоторые чудовища, кажется, начинают приспосабливаться. Рассказывают о рапторах, которые делают вид, будто нападают на караваны с провизией, пока другие пытаются пробраться через лавовую завесу».
— Дол, интендант из Лавобрега

foreignNames.name: 狂乱迅猛龙
foreignNames.flavor:
「虽然洛格凌道路两侧都设有预警水晶，但有些怪兽似乎已找出适应之法。之前就有过一批迅猛龙佯攻粮车，掩护另一批怪兽穿越熔岩屏障的事情。」
～熔缘城军需官达尔

foreignNames.name: 狂亂迅猛龍
foreignNames.flavor:
「雖然洛格凌道路兩側都設有預警水晶，但有些怪獸似乎已找出適應之法。之前就有過一批迅猛龍佯攻糧車，掩護另一批怪獸穿越熔岩屏障的事情。」

cards.name: Frondland Felidar

Vigilance

"Fear not the behemoth heard from miles away. Fear the stalking felidar, which reveals itself only for the kill."

rulings.text: Frondland Felidar’s last ability applies to itself as long as it still has vigilance.
You can activate the ability granted by Frondland Felidar after attacking but before blockers are chosen.
Tapping an attacking creature doesn’t remove it from combat.

Once you’ve activated the ability granted by Frondland Felidar, causing the creature to lose that ability (such as by removing Frondland Felidar from the battlefield) won’t affect the ability on the stack.

cards.originalText:
Vigilance
Creatures you control with vigilance have "{1}, {T}: Tap target creature."

cards.name: Frondland Felidar
cards.text:
Vigilance
Creatures you control with vigilance have "{1}, {T}: Tap target creature."

rulings.text: Frondland Felidar’s last ability applies to itself as long as it still has vigilance.
You can activate the ability granted by Frondland Felidar after attacking but before blockers are chosen.
Tapping an attacking creature doesn’t remove it from combat.

Once you’ve activated the ability granted by Frondland Felidar, causing the creature to lose that ability (such as by removing Frondland Felidar from the battlefield) won’t affect the ability on the stack.

cards.text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

rulings.text: Frost Lynx’s triggered ability can target a creature that’s already tapped. That creature won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

cards.name: Gemrazer
cards.text:
Mutate {1}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Reach, trample
Whenever this creature mutates, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

foreignNames.name: Kristallreißer
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {1}{G}{G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Reichweite, verursacht Trampelschaden
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl, das bzw. die ein Gegner kontrolliert.

Siempre que esta criatura mute, destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo que controla un oponente.

foreignNames.name: Terrasseur de gemmes
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {1}{G}{G} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)

À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, détruisez l'artefact ou l'enchantement ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle.

foreignNames.name: Spezzagemme

Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio controllato da un avversario.

foreignNames.name: 水晶壊し
foreignNames.text:
変容{1}{G}{G}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
到達、トランプル
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、対戦相手がコントロールしている、アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignNames.name: 보석파괴자
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {1}{G}{G} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
대공, 돌진
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 마법물체 또는 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.

foreignNames.name: Destruidor de Gemas
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {1}{G}{G} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)

cards.name: Genesis Ultimatum
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put any number of permanent cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand. Exile Genesis Ultimatum.
cards.flavor: No human eyes have ever witnessed the birth of an apex monster.

rulings.text: You can choose to not put a permanent card onto the battlefield this way. You’ll put it into your hand without revealing it and without saying whether it was a permanent card.
Any abilities that trigger as the permanents enter the battlefield this way won’t be put onto the stack until after Genesis Ultimatum has finished resolving and is in exile.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it enters the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.
An Aura being put onto the battlefield this way can’t enchant anything else that is being put onto the battlefield at the same time.

foreignNames.name: Genesis-Ultimatum
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Bringe davon eine beliebige Anzahl an bleibenden Karten ins Spiel und nimm den Rest auf deine Hand. Schicke das Genesis-Ultimatum ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor: Kein menschliches Auge hat je die Geburt eines Apex-Monsters gesehen.

foreignNames.text: Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon en el campo de batalla cualquier cantidad de cartas de permanente de entre ellas y el resto en tu mano. Exilia el Ultimátum de génesis.
foreignNames.flavor: Ningún humano ha contemplado el nacimiento de un monstruo alfa.

foreignNames.flavor: Aucun humain n'a jamais assisté à la naissance d'un monstre du zénith.

foreignNames.flavor: Nessun occhio umano ha mai assistito alla nascita di un mostro alfa.

飛行
{1}{U}：重置爍體浮蜇。
foreignNames.flavor:
「牠們的行進路線並非毫無規律，但卻也不是隨風飄行。也許是跟著水晶能量的起伏而動？」
～克崔亞元素師奈拉

cards.originalText:
Flying
{1}{U}: Untap Glimmerbell.

cards.name: Gloom Pangolin
cards.flavor:
"They say it survives on a purely bioluminescent diet. It's only active during the darkest of Indatha nights, making verification highly challenging."
—Gannet, Skysail zoologist

foreignNames.name: Düsternis-Schuppentier
foreignNames.flavor:
„Angeblich ernährt es sich rein biolumineszent. Es ist nur in den dunkelsten Nächten von Indatha aktiv, was eine Überprüfung sehr erschwert."
—Gannet, Himmelstadt-Zoologe

foreignNames.name: Pangolín de las tinieblas
foreignNames.flavor:
"Dicen que se alimenta únicamente de seres bioluminiscentes. Solo está activo durante las horas más oscuras de las noches de Indatha, por lo que verificar esa creencia es tremendamente difícil".
—Gánet, zoólogo de Puertoaéreo

foreignNames.name: Pangolin des ténèbres
foreignNames.flavor:
« Il semblerait être capable de survivre en se nourrissant de bioluminescence. Il n'est actif que pendant les nuits les plus sombres d'Indatha, ce qui le rend difficile à identifier. »
—Gannet, zoologue de Vogueciel

foreignNames.name: Pangolino Tetro
foreignNames.flavor:
"Dicono che sopravviva con una dieta strettamente bioluminescente. È attivo solo nelle notti più buie di Indatha, il che rende la verifica alquanto complessa."
—Gannet, zoologo della Solcanembi

foreignNames.name: 薄暗がりのセンザンコウ
foreignNames.flavor:
「生発光性の餌を食べるとされているが、インダサの夜でも最も暗い時間帯にしか活動しないので、その検証は非常に困難なんだ。」
――スカイセイルの動物学者、ガネット

foreignNames.name: 음울한 천산갑
foreignNames.flavor:
"사람들은 그것이 순전히 생체 발광 식단에만 의지해 살아간다고 하지. 그건 인다타의 가장 어두운 밤중에만 돌아다녀서, 식별하기가 엄청나게 힘들어."
—창공돛 동물학자, 가넷

foreignNames.name: Pangolim Sombrio
foreignNames.flavor:
"Dizem que ele vive de uma dieta puramente bioluminescente. Ele só aparece nas noites mais densas de Indatha, o que torna a verificação dessa informação deveras complicada."
— Gannet, zoólogo da Vela Celeste

foreignNames.name: Панголин Мрака
foreignNames.flavor:
«Говорят, он питается исключительно биолюминесцентными организмами. Проверить это сложно, ведь он активен только самыми темными индатскими ночами».
— Ганнет, зоолог Небесного Паруса

foreignNames.name: 幽光穿山甲
foreignNames.flavor:
「他们说这东西仅靠吃发光生物来维生。它只在因达沙最黑暗的夜晚中活动，因此要验证这点也变得十分困难。」
～翔空城动物学家加涅特

foreignNames.name: 幽光穿山甲
foreignNames.flavor:
「他們說這東西僅靠吃發光生物來維生。牠只在因達沙最黑暗的夜晚中活動，因此要驗證這點也變得十分困難。」
～翔空城動物學家加涅特

cards.name: Glowstone Recluse
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{G} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Reach
Whenever this creature mutates, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

foreignNames.name: Glimmstein-Einsiedlerspinne
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Reichweite
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, lege zwei +1/+1-Marken auf sie.

foreignNames.name: Reclusa de las rocas irradialuz
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {3}{G}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Alcance.
Siempre que esta criatura mute, pon dos contadores +1/+1 sobre ella.

foreignNames.name: Recluse des nitescenthes
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{G} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Portée
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, mettez deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle.

foreignNames.name: Eremita della Splendipietra
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {3}{G} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Raggiungere
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, metti due segnalini +1/+1 su di essa.

foreignNames.name: 輝き石のイトグモ
foreignNames.text:
変容{3}{G}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
到達
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを２個置く。

foreignNames.name: 발광석 은둔거미
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {3}{G} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
대공
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 이 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 올려놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Aranha-violino do Luminólito
foreignNames.text:
{3}{G} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Alcance
Toda vez que esta criatura sofrer mutação, coloque dois marcadores +1/+1 nela.

foreignNames.name: Отшельник Светокамня
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {3}{G} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Захват
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, положите на него два жетона +1/+1.

foreignNames.name: 光石隐士
foreignNames.text:
合变{3}{G}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
延势
每当此生物合变时，在其上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

foreignNames.name: 光石隱士
foreignNames.text:
合變{3}{G}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
延勢
每當此生物合變時，在其上放置兩個+1/+1指示物。

Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, kämpft gegen eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst. (Jede der Kreaturen fügt der anderen Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.)

あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体とあなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者と格闘を行う。（それぞれはもう一方に自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。）

cards.name: Greater Sandwurm
cards.text:
Greater Sandwurm can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: On Ikoria, sandwurms never lie dormant for too long. In some regions, "no activity" is the greatest sign of danger.

rulings.text: Once a creature with power 3 or greater has blocked Greater Sandwurm, changing the power of the blocking creature won’t cause Greater Sandwurm to become unblocked.

foreignNames.name: Großer Sandwurm
foreignNames.text:
Der Große Sandwurm kann von Kreaturen mit Stärke 2 oder weniger nicht geblockt werden.
Umwandlung {2} ({2}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
foreignNames.flavor: Auf Ikoria schlafen Sandwürmer nie lange. In einigen Regionen ist „keine Aktivität" das größte Anzeichen von Gefahr.

foreignNames.name: Gran sierpe de arena
foreignNames.text:
La Gran sierpe de arena no puede ser bloqueada por criaturas con fuerza de 2 o menos.
Ciclo {2}. ({2}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: En Ikoria, las sierpes de arena nunca yacen dormidas demasiado tiempo. En algunas regiones, la falta de actividad es el mayor signo de peligro.

foreignNames.name: Grande guivre des sables
foreignNames.text:
La Grande guivre des sables ne peut pas être bloquée par les créatures de force inférieure ou égale à 2.
Recyclage {2} ({2}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sur Ikoria, les guivres des sables ne sommeillent jamais longtemps. Dans certaines régions, « aucune activité » est synonyme de grand danger.

foreignNames.name: Wurm Sabbioso Maggiore
foreignNames.text:
Il Wurm Sabbioso Maggiore non può essere bloccato da creature con forza pari o inferiore a 2.
Ciclo {2} ({2}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: Su Ikoria, i wurm sabbiosi non restano mai in letargo troppo a lungo. In alcune regioni, l'assenza di attività è il più grande segnale di pericolo.

foreignNames.name: 大いなるサンドワーム
foreignNames.text:
大いなるサンドワームは、パワーが２以下のクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。
サイクリング{2}（{2}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
foreignNames.flavor: イコリアのサンドワームが長く休眠することはない。場所によっては、活動が見られないことが最大の危険の徴候である。

foreignNames.name: 대형 모래웜
foreignNames.text:
대형 모래웜은 공격력이 2 이하인 생물에게 방어될 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Grão-vorme-da-areia
foreignNames.text:
Grão-vorme-da-areia não pode ser bloqueado por criaturas com poder igual ou inferior a 2.

foreignNames.flavor: Em Ikoria os vormes-da-areia jamais dormem por muito tempo. Em algumas regiões, uma "inatividade" é o maior sinal de perigo.

foreignNames.name: Гигантский Песчаный Вурм
foreignNames.text:
Гигантский Песчаный Вурм не может быть заблокирован существами с силой 2 или меньше.
Цикл {2} ({2}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
foreignNames.flavor: На Икории песчаные вурмы никогда не дремлют слишком долго. В некоторых краях «отсутствие активности» — верный признак опасности.

foreignNames.name: 高大沙丘亚龙
foreignNames.text:
高大沙丘亚龙不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。
循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 依克黎的沙丘亚龙不会长时静止不动。因此在部分地区，「没在活动」才是最大的危险讯号。

foreignNames.name: 高大沙丘亞龍
foreignNames.text:
高大沙丘亞龍不能被力量等於或小於2的生物阻擋。
循環{2}（{2}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 依克黎的沙丘亞龍不會長時靜止不動。因此在部分地區，「沒在活動」才是最大的危險訊號。

cards.name: Grimdancer
cards.text: Grimdancer enters the battlefield with your choice of two different counters on it from among menace, deathtouch, and lifelink.
cards.flavor: Most monsters are more frightening when they skitter unseen in the dark. Most.

foreignNames.name: Gruseltänzer
foreignNames.text: Der Gruseltänzer kommt mit zwei verschiedenen der folgenden Marken ins Spiel, nämlich Bedrohlich, Todesberührung oder Lebensverknüpfung (du entscheidest).
foreignNames.flavor: Die meisten Monster sind gruseliger, solange sie ungesehen durch die Dunkelheit schleichen. Die meisten.

foreignNames.name: Danzarina del averno
foreignNames.text: La Danzarina del averno entra al campo de batalla con dos contadores sobre ella que elijas de entre los de amenaza, toque mortal y vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor: La mayoría de los monstruos dan más miedo cuando se deslizan por la noche sin ser vistos. La mayoría.

foreignNames.name: Danseur sinistre
foreignNames.text: Le Danseur sinistre arrive sur le champ de bataille avec, selon votre choix, deux marqueurs différents sur lui parmi « menace », « contact mortel » et « lien de vie ».
foreignNames.flavor: La plupart des monstres sont plus effrayants quand ils se faufilent discrètement dans le noir. Enfin, en règle générale.

foreignNames.name: Danzatore Lugubre
foreignNames.text: Il Danzatore Lugubre entra nel campo di battaglia con due segnalini diversi a tua scelta tra minacciare, tocco letale e legame vitale.
foreignNames.flavor: La maggior parte dei mostri sono più spaventosi quando brulicano invisibili nell'oscurità. La maggior parte.

foreignNames.name: 不気味舞い
foreignNames.text: 不気味舞いは、威迫か接死か絆魂のうちあなたが選んだ異なるカウンター２個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 大抵の生き物は、暗闇に紛れて走っている方が恐ろしいものだ。大抵は。

foreignNames.name: 음침한 무용수
foreignNames.text: 음침한 무용수는 호전적, 치명타 및 생명연결 중에서 당신이 선택한 서로 다른 카운터 두 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: 대부분의 괴수들은 어둠 속에서 보이지 않는 채로 돌아다닐 때 더 무섭다. 대부분은 말이다.

foreignNames.name: Dançarino Soturno
foreignNames.text: Dançarino Soturno entra no campo de batalha com dois marcadores diferentes à sua escolha entre ameaçar, toque mortífero e vínculo com a vida.
foreignNames.flavor: A maioria dos monstros é mais ameaçadora quando corre invisível pela escuridão. A maioria.

foreignNames.name: Зловещий Плясун
foreignNames.text: Зловещий Плясун выходит на поле битвы с двумя различными жетонами на нем по вашему выбору из Угрозы, Смертельного касания и Цепи жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: Большинство монстров страшнее всего, когда они незримо рыскают в темноте. Большинство.

foreignNames.name: 冷酷旋魇
foreignNames.text: 冷酷旋魇进战场时上面依你的选择有威慑、死触和系命三种指示物其中之二。
foreignNames.flavor: 对于大多数怪兽来说，是它们藏身黑暗窸窣移动时才最令人畏惧。至少大多数是这样。

foreignNames.name: 冷酷旋魘
foreignNames.text: 冷酷旋魘進戰場時上面依你的選擇有威懾、死觸和繫命三種指示物其中之二。
foreignNames.flavor: 對於大多數怪獸來說，是牠們藏身黑暗窸窣移動時才最令人畏懼。至少大多數是這樣。

cards.originalText: Grimdancer enters the battlefield with your choice of two different counters on it from among menace, deathtouch, and lifelink.

cards.name: Gust of Wind
cards.text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Skysail's strength was also its vulnerability.

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Gust of Wind). The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
Once you announce that you’re casting Gust of Wind, no player may take actions until the spell has been paid for. Notably, opponents can’t try to change whether you control a creature with flying.
Gust of Wind is unaffected if you no longer control a creature with flying after you’ve cast it.
If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target by the time Gust of Wind tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve. You won’t draw a card.

foreignNames.name: Windstoß
foreignNames.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken {2} weniger, falls du eine fliegende Kreatur kontrollierst.
Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du nicht kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Stärke von Himmelstadt war gleichzeitig auch ihr Schwachpunkt.

foreignNames.name: Ráfaga de viento
foreignNames.text:
Te cuesta {2} menos lanzar este hechizo si controlas una criatura con la habilidad de volar.
Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que no controlas a la mano de su propietario.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La fuerza de Puertoaéreo también es su vulnerabilidad.

foreignNames.name: Rafale de vent
foreignNames.text:
Ce sort coûte {2} de moins à lancer si vous contrôlez une créature avec le vol.
Renvoyez un permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas dans la main de son propriétaire.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: La force de Vogueciel était aussi sa faiblesse.

foreignNames.name: Raffica di Vento
foreignNames.text:
Questa magia costa {2} in meno per essere lanciata se controlli una creatura con volare.
Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio che non controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Il punto di forza della Solcanembi era anche la sua debolezza.

foreignNames.name: 疾風
foreignNames.text:
あなたが飛行を持つクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、この呪文を唱えるためのコストは{2}少なくなる。
あなたがコントロールしておらず土地でもないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: スカイセイルの強みは弱みでもある。

foreignNames.name: 한 줄기 돌풍
foreignNames.text:
당신이 비행을 가진 생물을 조종한다면 이 주문은 발동하는 데 {2}가 덜 든다.
당신이 조종하지 않는 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 창공돛의 힘은 또한 창공돛의 약점이기도 하다.

foreignNames.name: Lufada de Vento
foreignNames.text:
Esta mágica custa {2} a menos para ser conjurada se você controla uma criatura com voar.
Devolva a permanente alvo que você não controla que não seja um terreno para a mão de seu dono.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: O ponto de força da Vela Celeste era também seu ponto vulnerável.

foreignNames.name: Порыв Ветра
foreignNames.text:
Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {2} меньше, если вы контролируете существо с Полетом.
Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент, который не находится под вашим контролем, в руку его владельца.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: В силе Небесного Паруса одновременно и его слабость.

foreignNames.name: 劲风吹袭
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控具飞行异能的生物，则此咒语减少{2}来施放。
将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 翔空城的优势也恰好是其弱点。

foreignNames.name: 勁風吹襲
foreignNames.text:
如果你操控具飛行異能的生物，則此咒語減少{2}來施放。
將目標不由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。
抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 翔空城的優勢也恰好是其弱點。

cards.originalText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a creature with flying.
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Gyruda, Doom of Depths
cards.text:
Companion — Your starting deck contains only cards with even converted mana costs. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)
When Gyruda enters the battlefield, each player mills four cards. Put a creature card with an even converted mana cost from among the milled cards onto the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: If a replacement effect causes a player to exile the top four cards of their library instead of putting them into their graveyard as Gyruda’s triggered ability resolves, the creature card you choose may be one of those cards in exile.
Your companion begins the game outside the game. In tournament play, this means your sideboard. In casual play, it’s simply a card you own that’s not in your starting deck.

Before shuffling your deck to become your library, you may reveal one card from outside the game to be your companion if your starting deck meets the requirements of the companion ability. You can’t reveal more than one. It remains revealed outside the game as the game begins.
The requirements of the companion ability apply only to your starting deck. They do not apply to your sideboard.
If a card in a player’s graveyard has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The companion’s other abilities apply only if the creature is on the battlefield. They have no effect while the companion is outside the game.

The companion ability has no effect if the card is in your starting deck and creates no restriction on putting a card with a companion ability into your starting deck. For example, Zirda may be in your starting deck even if your other permanent cards don’t all have activated abilities.
You may have one companion in the Commander variant. Your deck, including your commander, must meet its companion requirement. Your companion is not one of your one hundred cards.

If more than one player wishes to reveal a companion, the starting player does so first, and players proceed in turn order. Once a player has chosen not to reveal a companion, that player can’t change their mind.
A card with converted mana cost 0 has an even converted mana cost.

Once you put your companion into your hand, it behaves like any other card you’ve brought into the game. For example, if it’s countered or destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard, remaining in the game.

Wizards of the Coast has issued functional errata for the Companion mechanic. Instead of casting companions from outside the game: Once per game, any time you could cast a sorcery (during your main phase when the stack is empty), you can pay {3} to put your companion from your sideboard into your hand. This is a special action, not an activated ability. It happens immediately and can’t be responded to. It can’t be countered or stopped by cards like Phyrexian Revoker. For more information please see https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/june-1-2020-banned-and-restricted-announcement

foreignNames.name: Gyruda, Verdammnis der Tiefen
foreignNames.text:
Gefährte — Dein Startdeck enthält nur Karten mit geraden umgewandelten Manakosten. (Falls du diese Karte als deinen Gefährten erwählt hast, kannst du sie einmal von außerhalb der Partie wirken.)
Wenn Gyruda ins Spiel kommt, legt jeder Spieler die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof. Bringe davon eine Kreaturenkarte mit geraden umgewandelten Manakosten unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel.

foreignNames.name: Gyruda, la Fatalidad de las Profundidades
foreignNames.text:
Compañero — Tu mazo inicial contiene solo cartas con costes de maná convertido pares. (Si esta carta es el compañero que eliges, puedes lanzarla una vez desde fuera del juego.)
Cuando Gyruda entre al campo de batalla, cada jugador pone las cuatro primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio. Pon una carta de criatura con un coste de maná convertido par de entre esas cartas en el campo de batalla bajo tu control.

foreignNames.name: Gyruda, calamité des profondeurs
foreignNames.text:
Compagnon — Votre deck de départ ne contient que des cartes avec un coût converti de mana pair. (Si cette carte est le compagnon de votre choix, vous pouvez la lancer une fois depuis l'extérieur de la partie.)
Quand Gyruda arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque joueur met les quatre cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière. Mettez sur le champ de bataille, sous votre contrôle, une carte de créature avec un coût converti de mana pair parmi ces cartes.

foreignNames.name: Gyruda, Rovina degli Abissi
foreignNames.text:
Compagno — Il tuo mazzo iniziale contiene solo carte con costi di mana convertiti pari. (Se questa carta è il compagno che hai scelto, puoi lanciarla una volta dal di fuori della partita.)
Quando Gyruda entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni giocatore mette nel proprio cimitero le prime quattro carte del proprio grimorio. Metti sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo una carta creatura con costo di mana convertito pari scelta tra quelle carte.

foreignNames.name: 深海の破滅、ジャイルーダ
foreignNames.text:
相棒 ― あなたの開始時のデッキに、点数で見たマナ・コストが偶数のカードのみが入っていること。（このカードがあなたの選んだ相棒であるなら、あなたは１回のみゲームの外部からこれを唱えてもよい。）
深海の破滅、ジャイルーダが戦場に出たとき、各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分のライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚自分の墓地に置く。それらのカードの中から、点数で見たマナ・コストが偶数のクリーチャー・カード１枚をあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出す。

foreignNames.name: 심해의 파멸, 자이루다
foreignNames.text:
단짝 — 당신의 시작 덱에는 전환마나비용이 짝수인 카드들만 들어 있다. (이 카드가 당신이 선택한 단짝이라면, 당신은 이 카드를 게임 밖에서 한 번 발동할 수 있다.)
자이루다가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위 카드 네 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. 그 카드들 중 전환마나비용이 짝수인 생물 카드 한 장을 당신의 조종하에 전장에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Gyruda, Ruína das Profundezas
foreignNames.text:
Companheiro — Seu deck inicial contém apenas cards com custos de mana convertido pares. (Se este card for o companheiro que escolheu, você poderá conjurá-lo uma vez de fora do jogo.)
Quando Gyruda entra no campo de batalha, cada jogador coloca os quatro cards do topo do próprio grimório no próprio cemitério. Coloque um card de criatura com custo de mana convertido par dentre eles no campo de batalha sob seu controle.

foreignNames.name: Джайруда, Погибель из Бездны
foreignNames.text:
Компаньон — Ваша начальная колода содержит только карты с четной конвертированной мана-стоимостью. (Если эта карта является вашим избранным Компаньоном, то вы можете один раз разыграть ее из-за пределов игры.)
Когда Джайруда выходит на поле битвы, каждый игрок кладет четыре верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище. Положите находящуюся среди них карту существа с четной конвертированной мана-стоимостью на поле битвы под вашим контролем.

foreignNames.name: 深渊灾祸翟鲁达
foreignNames.text:
行侣～你起始套牌中仅包含总法术力费用为偶数的牌。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以从游戏外施放它，但仅限一次。）
当翟鲁达进战场时，每位牌手各将其牌库顶的四张牌置入其坟墓场。你将这些牌其中一张总法术力费用为偶数的生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。

foreignNames.name: 深淵災禍翟魯達
foreignNames.text:
行侶～你起始套牌中僅包含總魔法力費用為偶數的牌。（如果你選擇這張牌作為你的行侶，則你可以從遊戲外施放它，但僅限一次。）
當翟魯達進戰場時，每位玩家各將其牌庫頂的四張牌置入其墳墓場。你將這些牌其中一張總魔法力費用為偶數的生物牌在你的操控下放進戰場。

foreignNames.flavor: Гайган, Кошмарный Киберкоготь

foreignNames.flavor: 生化惧爪盖刚

foreignNames.flavor: 生化懼爪蓋剛

cards.name: Heartless Act
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with no counters on it.
• Remove up to three counters from target creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's them or us."
—General Kudro

rulings.text: If you choose the second mode for Heartless Act, you choose which counters to remove from the creature, no matter who controls the creature. You may choose counters of different kinds.

If you choose the first mode and the creature gains a counter in response, you can’t remove counters from it instead; the spell just doesn’t resolve. Similarly, if you choose the second mode and the creature loses its counters in response, you can’t destroy it instead.

rulings.text: If you choose the second mode for Heartless Act, you choose which counters to remove from the creature, no matter who controls the creature. You may choose counters of different kinds.

If you choose the first mode and the creature gains a counter in response, you can’t remove counters from it instead; the spell just doesn’t resolve. Similarly, if you choose the second mode and the creature loses its counters in response, you can’t destroy it instead.

뿔돌진 스승이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 돌진 카운터를 올려놓는다.
{2}{G}, {T}: 당신이 조종하는 돌진을 가진 각 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리는 사냥꾼들과 군부대 멍청이들에 대해 비슷한 의미인 의견을 공유하지. 그것들을 때려눕힌다는 것 말이야."

foreignNames.name: Mentor da Chifradaria
foreignNames.text:
Quando Mentor da Chifradaria entrar no campo de batalha, coloque um marcador de atropelar na criatura alvo que você controla que não seja um Humano.
{2}{G}, {T}: Coloque um marcador +1/+1 em cada criatura com atropelar que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Temos a mesma opinião extremamente ponderada dos caçadores e dos militares: senta a pua."

foreignNames.name: Наставник Таранного Рога
foreignNames.text:
Когда Наставник Таранного Рога выходит на поле битвы, положите один жетон Пробивного удара на целевое не являющееся Человеком существо под вашим контролем.
{2}{G}, {T}: положите один жетон +1/+1 на каждое существо с Пробивным ударом под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: «Мы разделяем мнение относительно охотников и армейских дуболомов в мельчайших подробностях: давить гадов».

foreignNames.name: 突角明师
foreignNames.text:
当突角明师进战场时，在目标由你操控的非人类生物上放置一个践踏指示物。
{2}{G}，{T}：在每个由你操控且具践踏异能的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我们对猎人和大兵的看法基本一致：砸他们就对了。」

foreignNames.name: 突角明師
foreignNames.text:
當突角明師進戰場時，在目標由你操控的非人類生物上放置一個踐踏指示物。
{2}{G}，{T}：在每個由你操控且具踐踏異能的生物上各放置一個+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我們對獵人和大兵的看法基本一致：砸他們就對了。」

cards.originalText:
When Hornbash Mentor enters the battlefield, put a trample counter on target non-Human creature you control.
{2}{G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with trample.

cards.name: Humble Naturalist
cards.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
cards.flavor: "The key to bonding with monsters, no matter their size, is knowing where they like to be scratched."

rulings.text: Mana produced by Humble Naturalist can be spent on any part of a creature spell’s total cost, including additional costs (such as kicker costs) and alternative costs (such as mutate costs). It can’t be spent to pay the costs of abilities of creatures you control.

foreignNames.name: Demütiger Naturkundler
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um einen Kreaturenzauber zu wirken.
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Schlüssel, um sich mit Monstern, egal welcher Größe, zu verbinden, ist zu wissen, wo sie gekrault werden wollen."

foreignNames.name: Naturalista humilde
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "La clave de la vinculación con monstruos, sin importar su tamaño, es saber dónde les gusta que los rasquen".

foreignNames.name: Humble naturaliste
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort de créature.
foreignNames.flavor: « Le secret pour former un lien avec un monstre, quelle que soit sa taille, est de savoir où il aime qu'on le gratte. »

foreignNames.name: Naturalista Umile
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "Il segreto per creare un vincolo con i mostri, a prescindere dalle dimensioni, è sapere dove adorano essere grattati."

foreignNames.name: 謙虚な自然主義者
foreignNames.text: {T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、クリーチャー・呪文を唱えるためにのみ使用できる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「怪物との絆を深める秘訣は、どんな大きさであろうと、掻いて欲しがっているところを知ることさ。」

foreignNames.name: 겸손한 자연주의자
foreignNames.text: {T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다. 이 마나는 생물 주문을 발동하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "크기와는 상관없이, 괴수와 유대하는 일의 핵심은 그것들이 어디를 긁어 주면 좋아하는 지를 아는 것이다."

foreignNames.name: Naturalista Humilde
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar uma mágica de criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: "A chave para os vínculos com os monstros, independentemente do tamanho, é saber onde eles gostam de receber carinho."

foreignNames.name: Скромный Натуралист
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинания существа.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ключ к тому, чтобы установить узы с чудовищем, каким бы громадным оно ни было, — это знать, где его почесать».

foreignNames.name: 谦卑归真师
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放生物咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「怪兽不论大小，与其建立羁绊的关键都在于弄清楚它们喜欢你挠哪里。」

foreignNames.name: 謙卑歸真師
foreignNames.text: {T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。此魔法力只能用來施放生物咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「怪獸不論大小，與其建立羈絆的關鍵都在於弄清楚牠們喜歡你搔哪裡。」

cards.name: Hunted Nightmare
cards.text:
Menace
When Hunted Nightmare enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a deathtouch counter on a creature they control.

rulings.text: The target opponent chooses which of their creatures receives a deathtouch counter.
If the target opponent controls no creatures, they won’t put a deathtouch counter on any creature.

cards.text:
Menace

cards.flavor:

rulings.text: The target opponent chooses which of their creatures receives a deathtouch counter.

Bedrohlich

foreignNames.flavor:
„Die furchterregendsten Monster inspirieren die epischsten Geschichten. Die epischsten Geschichten inspirieren die furchterregendsten Jäger."
—Rielle die Allwissende

foreignNames.name: Pesadilla perseguida
foreignNames.text:
Amenaza.
Cuando la Pesadilla perseguida entre al campo de batalla, el oponente objetivo pone un contador de toque mortal sobre una criatura que controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los monstruos más crueles inspiran las mejores historias. Las mejores historias inspiran a los cazadores más crueles".
—Rielle, la Versada

foreignNames.name: Cauchemar au rabais
foreignNames.text:
Menace
Quand le Cauchemar au rabais arrive sur le champ de bataille, l'adversaire ciblé met un marqueur « contact mortel » sur une créature qu'il contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les monstres les plus cruels inspirent les plus grandes histoires. Les plus grandes histoires inspirent les chasseurs les plus cruels. »
—Rielle, l'éternisciente

foreignNames.name: Incubo Braccato
foreignNames.text:
Minacciare
Quando l'Incubo Braccato entra nel campo di battaglia, un avversario bersaglio mette un segnalino tocco letale su una creatura che controlla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"I mostri più crudeli ispirano i racconti più avvincenti. I racconti più avvincenti ispirano i cacciatori più crudeli."
—Rielle, l'Onnisapiente

foreignNames.name: 狩り立てられた悪夢
foreignNames.text:
威迫
狩り立てられた悪夢が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のコントロールしているクリーチャー１体の上に接死カウンターを１個置く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「最悪の怪物が最高の物語を生む。最高の物語が最悪の狩人を生む。」
――常智のリエール

foreignNames.name: 사냥당하는 나이트메어
foreignNames.text:
호전적
사냥당하는 나이트메어가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 치명타 카운터를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"가장 잔인한 괴수들이 가장 엄청난 이야기들을 만들어낸다. 가장 엄청난 이야기들은 가장 잔인한 사냥꾼들을 만들어내고."
—지고의 현인, 리엘

foreignNames.name: Pesadelo Caçado
foreignNames.text:
Ameaçar
Quando Pesadelo Caçado entra no campo de batalha, o oponente alvo coloca um marcador de toque mortífero em uma criatura que ele controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Os monstros mais cruéis inspiram as maiores histórias. E as maiores histórias inspiram os caçadores mais cruéis."
— Rielle, a Onissapiente

foreignNames.name: Загнанный Кошмар
foreignNames.text:
Угроза
Когда Загнанный Кошмар выходит на поле битвы, целевой оппонент кладет один жетон Смертельного касания на существо под своим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Самые жестокие монстры порождают самые захватывающие истории. Самые захватывающие истории порождают самых жестоких охотников».
— Риэлль, Вечномудрая

foreignNames.name: 遭缉梦魇
foreignNames.text:
威慑
当遭缉梦魇进战场时，目标对手在一个由其操控的生物上放置一个死触指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「最凶残的怪兽留下最精彩的故事，最精彩的故事鼓舞最凶残的猎人。」
～全知利艾尔

foreignNames.name: 遭緝夢魘
foreignNames.text:
威懾
當遭緝夢魘進戰場時，目標對手在一個由其操控的生物上放置一個死觸指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「最凶殘的怪獸留下最精彩的故事，最精彩的故事鼓舞最凶殘的獵人。」
～全知利艾爾

cards.originalText:
Menace
When Hunted Nightmare enters the battlefield, target opponent puts a deathtouch counter on a creature they control.

cards.name: Huntmaster Liger
cards.text:
Mutate {2}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, other creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of times this creature has mutated.

rulings.text: Huntmaster Liger’s triggered ability affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won’t get +X/+X.

The value of X is determined only as the triggered ability resolves. Once that happens, the value of X won’t change later in the turn even if Huntmaster Liger mutates again, although in that case the creatures will receive a second, larger +X/+X in addition to the one generated by the ability’s earlier resolution.

foreignNames.name: Jagdanführer-Liger
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}{W} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, erhalten andere Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, bis zum Ende des Zuges +X/+X, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Mutationen dieser Kreatur ist.

foreignNames.name: Ligre maestro de la caza
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {2}{W}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Siempre que esta criatura mute, las otras criaturas que controlas obtienen +X/+X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la cantidad de veces que esta criatura ha mutado.

foreignNames.name: Ligre maître-chasseur
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {2}{W} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, les autres créatures que vous contrôlez gagnent +X/+X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant le nombre de mutations subies par cette créature.

foreignNames.name: Ligre Capocaccia
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {2}{W} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, le altre creature che controlli prendono +X/+X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è il numero di volte che questa creatura è mutata.

foreignNames.name: 猟匠ライガー
foreignNames.text:
変容{2}{W}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、ターン終了時まで、他の、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは＋Ｘ/＋Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘはこのクリーチャーが変容した回数に等しい。

foreignNames.name: 사냥지휘관 라이거
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {2}{W} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물들은 턴종료까지 +X/+X를 받는다. X는 이 생물이 돌연변이화한 수이다.

foreignNames.name: Ligre Mestre de Caça
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {2}{W} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Toda vez que esta criatura sofre mutação, as outras criaturas que você controla recebem +X/+X até o final do turno, sendo X o número de mutações desta criatura.

foreignNames.name: Ловчий Лигр
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {2}{W} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, другие существа под вашим контролем получают +X/+X до конца хода, где Х — число мутаций этого существа.

foreignNames.name: 善猎狮虎
foreignNames.text:
合变{2}{W}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
每当此生物合变时，由你操控的其他生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为此生物已合变的次数。

foreignNames.name: 善獵獅虎
foreignNames.text:
合變{2}{W}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
每當此生物合變時，由你操控的其他生物得+X/+X直到回合結束，X為此生物已合變的次數。

cards.originalText:
Mutate {2}{W}
Whenever this creature mutates, other creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of times this creature has mutated.

cards.name: Illuna, Apex of Wishes
cards.text:
Mutate {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flying, trample
Whenever this creature mutates, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland permanent card. Put that card onto the battlefield or into your hand.

rulings.text: Illuna’s last ability exiles the cards face up. All players will see what the card is if you put it into your hand.
You choose whether to put the card into your hand or onto the battlefield after seeing what the card is.
A nonland permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, or planeswalker card.
Any land, instant, and sorcery cards exiled this way remain in exile.

If an Aura is put onto the battlefield without being cast, the Aura’s controller-to-be chooses what it will enchant as it enters the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn’t target anything (so it could be attached to an opponent’s permanent with hexproof, for example), but the Aura’s enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can’t legally be attached to anything, it remains in its current zone.

foreignNames.name: Illuna, Apex der Wünsche
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Mutationskosten wirkst, lege ihn auf oder unter eine Nicht-Mensch-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du besitzt. Sie mutieren zur oben liegenden Kreatur, die zusätzlich alle Fähigkeiten der darunter liegenden hat.)
Fliegend, verursacht Trampelschaden
Immer wenn diese Kreatur mutiert, schicke so lange die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek ins Exil, bis du eine bleibende Karte aufdeckst, die kein Land ist. Bringe sie ins Spiel oder nimm sie auf deine Hand.

foreignNames.name: Illuna, Alfa de los Deseos
foreignNames.text:
Mutación {3}{R/G}{U}{U}. (Si lanzas este hechizo pagando su coste de mutación, ponlo sobre o bajo la criatura objetivo que no sea Humano de la cual eres propietario. Estas mutan en la criatura de la parte superior más todas las habilidades de debajo.)
Vuela, arrolla.
Siempre que esta criatura mute, exilia cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca hasta que exilies una carta de permanente que no sea tierra. Pon esa carta en el campo de batalla o en tu mano.

foreignNames.name: Illuna, Zénith des souhaits
foreignNames.text:
Mutation {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (Si vous lancez ce sort pour son coût de mutation, mettez-le au-dessus ou au-dessous d'une créature non-Humain ciblée que vous possédez. La créature mutante est la créature du dessus, avec toutes les capacités des cartes au-dessous.)
Vol, piétinement
À chaque fois que cette créature subit une mutation, exilez les cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque jusqu'à ce que vous exiliez une carte de permanent non-terrain. Mettez cette carte sur le champ de bataille ou dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Illuna, Alfa dei Desideri
foreignNames.text:
Mutazione {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (Se lanci questa magia per il suo costo di mutazione, mettila sopra o sotto una creatura non Umano bersaglio che possiedi. Muta nella creatura sopra, con anche le abilità di quelle sotto.)
Volare, travolgere
Ogniqualvolta questa creatura muta, esilia carte dalla cima del tuo grimorio finché non esili una carta permanente non terra. Metti quella carta sul campo di battaglia o aggiungila alla tua mano.

foreignNames.name: 願いの頂点、イルーナ
foreignNames.text:
変容{3}{R/G}{U}{U}（あなたがこの呪文をこれの変容コストで唱えるなら、あなたがオーナーであり人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、これをそれの上か下に置く。これらは、一番上のクリーチャーに、その下にある能力すべてを加えたものに変容する。）
飛行、トランプル
このクリーチャーが変容するたび、土地でないパーマネント・カードが追放されるまで、あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを１枚ずつ追放する。そのカードを戦場に出すか、あなたの手札に加える。

foreignNames.name: 소원의 정점, 일루나
foreignNames.text:
돌연변이화 {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (당신이 돌연변이화 비용을 지불해 이 주문을 발동한다면, 당신이 소유한 인간이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 이 카드를 그 생물의 위 또는 아래에 놓는다. 그 생물은 맨 위에 있는 생물이 그 아래에 놓인 카드들의 모든 능력을 가진 생물로 돌연변이화한다.)
비행, 돌진
이 생물이 돌연변이화할 때마다, 대지가 아닌 지속물 카드가 추방될 때까지 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드를 추방한다. 그 카드를 전장에 놓거나 당신의 손에 넣는다.

foreignNames.name: Illuna, Ápice dos Desejos
foreignNames.text:
Mutação {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (Se você conjurar esta mágica pelo custo de mutação, coloque-a sobre ou sob a criatura alvo que você possui que não seja um Humano. Elas sofrem uma mutação que resulta na criatura de cima com todas as habilidades das criaturas de baixo.)
Voar, atropelar
Toda vez que esta criatura sofrer mutação, exile cards do topo de seu grimório até exilar um card de permanente que não seja um terreno. Coloque aquele card no campo de batalha ou em sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Иллуна, Венец Желаний
foreignNames.text:
Мутация {3}{R/G}{U}{U} (Если вы разыграли это заклинание за его стоимость Мутации, положите его сверху или снизу целевого принадлежащего вам существа, не являющегося Человеком. Они мутируют в существо сверху, которому добавляются все способности снизу.)
Полет, Пробивной удар
Каждый раз, когда это существо мутирует, изгоняйте карты с верха вашей библиотеки, пока вы не изгоните карту не являющегося землей перманента. Положите ту карту на поле битвы или в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: 控念霸兽依卢那
foreignNames.text:
合变{3}{R/G}{U}{U}（如果你支付此咒语的合变费用来施放之，则将它放置在目标由你拥有之非人类生物的顶上或底下。它们合变作顶上的生物，外加具有底下所有异能。）
飞行，践踏
每当此生物合变时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地永久物牌为止。将该牌放进战场或置于你手上。

foreignNames.name: 控念霸獸依盧那
foreignNames.text:
合變{3}{R/G}{U}{U}（如果你支付此咒語的合變費用來施放之，則將它放置在目標由你擁有之非人類生物的頂上或底下。它們合變作頂上的生物，外加具有底下所有異能。）
飛行，踐踏
每當此生物合變時，從你的牌庫頂開始放逐牌，直到放逐一張非地永久物牌為止。將該牌放進戰場或置於你手上。

cards.name: Imposing Vantasaur
cards.text:
Vigilance
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Raugrin's coastline can be quite beautiful, as long as you avoid the volcanic dinosaurs, the sea dinosaurs, and the roaming beach dinosaurs.

foreignNames.name: Imposanter Vantasaurus
foreignNames.text:
Wachsamkeit
Umwandlung {1} ({1}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
foreignNames.flavor: Die Küste von Raugrin kann sehr schön sein, solange man den Vulkansauriern, den Meeressauriern und den umherstreifenden Strandsauriern aus dem Weg geht.

foreignNames.name: Altosaurio imponente
foreignNames.text:
Vigilancia.
Ciclo {1}. ({1}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: La costa de Raugrin puede ser muy hermosa, siempre que evites los dinosaurios volcánicos, los dinosaurios marinos y los dinosaurios que rondan por la playa.

foreignNames.name: Miradosaure imposant
foreignNames.text:
Vigilance
Recyclage {1} ({1}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
foreignNames.flavor: La côte de Raugrin peut être très belle tant qu'on évite les dinosaures volcaniques, les dinosaures des mers, et les dinosaures des sables.

foreignNames.name: Superiosauro Imponente
foreignNames.text:
Cautela
Ciclo {1} ({1}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: La costa di Raugrin può essere incantevole, basta evitare i dinosauri vulcanici, quelli marini e quelli che vagano sulla spiaggia.

foreignNames.name: 威圧するヴァンタサウルス
foreignNames.text:
警戒
サイクリング{1}（{1}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
foreignNames.flavor: ラウグリンの海岸線は非常に美しい。火山の恐竜や、海の恐竜、そして辺りをうろつく海岸の恐竜を避けることさえできれば。

foreignNames.name: 위압적인 반타사우루스
foreignNames.text:
경계
순환 {1} ({1}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 라우그린의 해안선은 아주 아름답다. 화산 공룡, 바다 공룡, 그리고 돌아다니는 해안 공룡들을 피해 다닐 수만 있다면 말이다.

foreignNames.name: Vantassauro Imponente
foreignNames.text:
Vigilância
Reciclar {1} ({1}, descarte este card: Compre um card.)
foreignNames.flavor: O litoral de Raugrin pode ser lindo, desde que você evite os dinossauros vulcânicos, os dinossauros marinhos e os dinossauros que vagam pelas praias.

foreignNames.name: Внушительный Вышезавр
foreignNames.text:
Бдительность
Цикл {1} ({1}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
foreignNames.flavor: Побережье Раугрина — очень красивое место, если не попадаться вулканическим динозаврам, морским динозаврам и динозаврам, бродящим по берегу.

foreignNames.name: 庄严高颈龙
foreignNames.text:
警戒
循环{1}（{1}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 洛格凌的沿岸风光堪称绝景，只是你要小心躲开火山恐龙、栖海恐龙和四处游荡的海滩恐龙。

foreignNames.name: 莊嚴高頸龍
foreignNames.text:
警戒
循環{1}（{1}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 洛格凌的沿岸風光堪稱絕景，只是你要小心躲開火山恐龍、棲海恐龍和四處遊蕩的海灘恐龍。

Vigilance

cards.name: Indatha Crystal
cards.text:
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: Crystals nestle in the roots of Indatha's helica trees as if being nurtured by their embrace.

foreignNames.name: Indatha-Kristall
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {W}, {B} oder {G}.
Umwandlung {2} ({2}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kristalle schmiegen sich an die Wurzeln von Indathas Helixbäumen, als ob sie von ihrer Umarmung genährt würden.

foreignNames.name: Cristal de Indatha
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {W}, {B} o {G}.
Ciclo {2}. ({2}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: Los cristales anidan en las raíces de los hélicas de Indatha, como si su abrazo los nutriera.

foreignNames.name: Cristal d'Indatha
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {W}, {B} ou {G}.
Recyclage {2} ({2}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les cristaux se nichent dans les racines des spiracacias d'Indatha comme s'ils se nourrissaient de leur étreinte.

foreignNames.name: Cristallo di Indatha
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {W}, {B} o {G}.
Ciclo {2} ({2}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor: I cristalli si annidano tra le radici di fitoelice di Indatha come se fossero alimentati dal loro abbraccio.

foreignNames.name: インダサの水晶
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{W}か{B}か{G}を加える。
サイクリング{2}（{2}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
foreignNames.flavor: 水晶はインダサのらせん樹の根に抱かれている。まるでその抱擁に育まれているかのようだ。

foreignNames.name: 인다타 수정
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {W}, {B}, 또는 {G}를 추가한다.
순환 {2} ({2}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 수정들은 인다타의 헬리카 나무들의 뿌리 속에서 마치 뿌리가 수정을 보듬고 안은 것처럼 자리를 잡고 있다.

foreignNames.name: Cristal de Indatha
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {W}, {B} ou {G}.
Reciclar {2} ({2}, descarte este card: Compre um card.)
foreignNames.flavor: Os cristais se aninham nas raízes das heliqueiras de Indatha, como se fossem nutridos por seu abraço.

foreignNames.name: Кристалл Индаты
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {W}, {B} или {G}.
Цикл {2} ({2}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
foreignNames.flavor: Кристаллы растут среди корней спираледеревьев, словно вскармливаемые их объятьями.

foreignNames.name: 因达沙水晶
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{W}，{B}或{G}。
循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 因达沙的水晶受曲枝树根系环绕，仿佛受其呵护而不断成长。

foreignNames.name: 因達沙水晶
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{W}，{B}或{G}。
循環{2}（{2}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
foreignNames.flavor: 因達沙的水晶受曲枝樹根系環繞，彷彿受其呵護而不斷成長。

cards.name: Indatha Triome
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.)
Indatha Triome enters the battlefield tapped.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor:
"These lowlands were formed thousands of years ago by behemoth Indath—its final footsteps before vanishing into the sea."
—*Tales of the Ozolith*

foreignNames.name: Indatha-Triom
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W}, {B} oder {G}.)
Das Indatha-Triom kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Umwandlung {3} ({3}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
foreignNames.flavor:
„Diese Tiefebenen wurden vor tausenden Jahren vom Behemoth Indath geschaffen — seine letzten Fußabdrücke, bevor er im Meer verschwand."
—*Geschichten vom Ozolith*

foreignNames.name: Trioma de Indatha
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {W}, {B} o {G}.)
El Trioma de Indatha entra al campo de batalla girado.
Ciclo {3}. ({3}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Estos pantanos los formó hace miles de años el behemot Indath, y fueron sus últimos pasos antes de desvanecerse en el mar".
—*Cuentos del Ozolito*

foreignNames.name: Triome d'Indatha
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W}, {B} ou {G}.)
Le Triome d'Indatha arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Recyclage {3} ({3}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
foreignNames.flavor:
« Ces basses terres furent formées il y a des millénaires par le béhémoth Indath : il s'agissait de ses derniers pas avant de disparaître dans l'océan. »
—*Contes de l'Ozolithe*

foreignNames.name: Trioma di Indatha
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W}, {B} o {G}.)
Il Trioma di Indatha entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
Ciclo {3} ({3}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Questi bassopiani vennero formati migliaia di anni fa dal behemoth Indath, quando mosse i suoi ultimi passi prima di svanire nel mare."
—*Racconti dell'Ozolito*

foreignNames.name: インダサのトライオーム
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{W}か{B}か{G}を加える。）
インダサのトライオームはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
サイクリング{3}（{3}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
foreignNames.flavor:
「この低地は何千年も前にインダス巨獣が作り出した。それが海へ消える前に残した、最後の足跡なのだ。」
――*オゾリスの物語*

foreignNames.name: 인다타 삼생물군계
foreignNames.text:
({T}: {W}, {B}, 또는 {G}를 추가한다.)
인다타 삼생물군계는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
순환 {3} ({3}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"이 저지대는 수천 년 전 거대괴수 인다스가 바다로 사라지기 전에 마지막으로 남긴 발자국으로 형성되었다."
—*오조리스 이야기*

foreignNames.name: Trioma de Indatha
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {W}, {B} ou {G}.)
Trioma de Indatha entra no campo de batalha virado.
Reciclar {3} ({3}, descarte este card: Compre um card.)
foreignNames.flavor:
"Essas baixadas foram formadas há milhares de anos pelo colossal Indath, foram seus últimos passos antes de desaparecer no mar."
— *Contos do Ozólito*

foreignNames.name: Триом Индата
foreignNames.text:
({T}: добавьте {W}, {B} или {G}.)
Триом Индата выходит на поле битвы повернутым.

cards.name: Jegantha, the Wellspring
cards.text:
Companion — No card in your starting deck has more than one of the same mana symbol in its mana cost. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

rulings.text: Your companion begins the game outside the game. In tournament play, this means your sideboard. In casual play, it’s simply a card you own that’s not in your starting deck.

Before shuffling your deck to become your library, you may reveal one card from outside the game to be your companion if your starting deck meets the requirements of the companion ability. You can’t reveal more than one. It remains revealed outside the game as the game begins.
The requirements of the companion ability apply only to your starting deck. They do not apply to your sideboard.

Jegantha’s companion ability compares the exact symbols in the mana costs of cards in your deck. If any one card has the same symbol twice, such as {X}{X}{R} or , the companion condition isn’t satisfied.
The companion’s other abilities apply only if the creature is on the battlefield. They have no effect while the companion is outside the game.

The companion ability has no effect if the card is in your starting deck and creates no restriction on putting a card with a companion ability into your starting deck. For example, Zirda may be in your starting deck even if your other permanent cards don’t all have activated abilities.
You may have one companion in the Commander variant. Your deck, including your commander, must meet its companion requirement. Your companion is not one of your one hundred cards.

If more than one player wishes to reveal a companion, the starting player does so first, and players proceed in turn order. Once a player has chosen not to reveal a companion, that player can’t change their mind.
A generic mana cost is usually represented by numeric mana symbols ({1}, {2}, and so on) and also {X}. It is any cost requiring mana where that cost isn’t {C}, {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, or {G}.

Once you put your companion into your hand, it behaves like any other card you’ve brought into the game. For example, if it’s countered or destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard, remaining in the game.

Wizards of the Coast has issued functional errata for the Companion mechanic. Instead of casting companions from outside the game: Once per game, any time you could cast a sorcery (during your main phase when the stack is empty), you can pay {3} to put your companion from your sideboard into your hand. This is a special action, not an activated ability. It happens immediately and can’t be responded to. It can’t be countered or stopped by cards like Phyrexian Revoker. For more information please see https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/june-1-2020-banned-and-restricted-announcement

cards.originalText:
Companion — No card in your starting deck has more than one of the same mana symbol in its mana cost. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may cast it once from outside the game.)
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

cards.name: Jegantha, the Wellspring
cards.text:
Companion — No card in your starting deck has more than one of the same mana symbol in its mana cost. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)
{T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

rulings.text: Your companion begins the game outside the game. In tournament play, this means your sideboard. In casual play, it’s simply a card you own that’s not in your starting deck.

Before shuffling your deck to become your library, you may reveal one card from outside the game to be your companion if your starting deck meets the requirements of the companion ability. You can’t reveal more than one. It remains revealed outside the game as the game begins.
The requirements of the companion ability apply only to your starting deck. They do not apply to your sideboard.

Jegantha’s companion ability compares the exact symbols in the mana costs of cards in your deck. If any one card has the same symbol twice, such as {X}{X}{R} or , the companion condition isn’t satisfied.
The companion’s other abilities apply only if the creature is on the battlefield. They have no effect while the companion is outside the game.

The companion ability has no effect if the card is in your starting deck and creates no restriction on putting a card with a companion ability into your starting deck. For example, Zirda may be in your starting deck even if your other permanent cards don’t all have activated abilities.
You may have one companion in the Commander variant. Your deck, including your commander, must meet its companion requirement. Your companion is not one of your one hundred cards.

If more than one player wishes to reveal a companion, the starting player does so first, and players proceed in turn order. Once a player has chosen not to reveal a companion, that player can’t change their mind.
A generic mana cost is usually represented by numeric mana symbols ({1}, {2}, and so on) and also {X}. It is any cost requiring mana where that cost isn’t {C}, {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, or {G}.

Once you put your companion into your hand, it behaves like any other card you’ve brought into the game. For example, if it’s countered or destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard, remaining in the game.

Wizards of the Coast has issued functional errata for the Companion mechanic. Instead of casting companions from outside the game: Once per game, any time you could cast a sorcery (during your main phase when the stack is empty), you can pay {3} to put your companion from your sideboard into your hand. This is a special action, not an activated ability. It happens immediately and can’t be responded to. It can’t be countered or stopped by cards like Phyrexian Revoker. For more information please see https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/june-1-2020-banned-and-restricted-announcement

cards.name: Jubilant Skybonder
cards.text:
Flying
Creatures you control with flying have "Spells your opponents cast that target this creature cost {2} more to cast."
cards.flavor: She was born unable to walk. Through the *eludha*, she was able to fly.

rulings.text: Jubilant Skybonder’s last ability applies to itself as long as it still has flying.

An opponent’s spell that targets a single creature with flying you control more than once costs only {2} more to cast. An opponent’s spell that targets multiple creatures with flying you control costs {2} more for each of those creatures.

foreignNames.name: Jauchzende Himmelsbynderin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Fliegende Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben „Zaubersprüche, die deine Gegner wirken und die diese Kreatur als Ziel haben, kosten beim Wirken {2} mehr."
foreignNames.flavor: Sie wurde geboren und konnte nicht laufen. *Eludha* verhalf ihr zum Fliegen.

foreignNames.name: Vinculacielos exultante
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Las criaturas que controlas con la habilidad de volar tienen "A tus oponentes les cuesta {2} más lanzar hechizos que hagan objetivo a esta criatura".
foreignNames.flavor: Jamás pudo andar. Pero gracias a la *eludha*, fue capaz de volar.

foreignNames.name: Brideciel allègre
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Les créatures avec le vol que vous contrôlez ont « Les sorts que vos adversaires lancent qui ciblent cette créature coûtent {2} de plus à lancer. »
foreignNames.flavor: Elle est née sans espoir de marcher un jour. Grâce à l'*éludha*, elle peut voler.

foreignNames.name: Vincolacieli Esultante
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Le creature con volare che controlli hanno "Le magie che i tuoi avversari lanciano e che bersagliano questa creatura costano {2} in più per essere lanciate".
foreignNames.flavor: È nata incapace di camminare. Grazie all'*eludha*, è stata capace di volare.

foreignNames.name: 歓喜する空眷者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
あなたがコントロールしていて飛行を持つクリーチャーは「対戦相手がこのクリーチャーを対象として唱える呪文のコストは{2}多くなる。」を持つ。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼女は生まれつき歩けなかったが、*エルーダ*を通じて飛べるようになった。

foreignNames.name: 기쁨에 찬 창공유대자
foreignNames.text:
비행
당신이 조종하는 비행을 가진 생물들은 "당신의 상대들이 이 생물을 목표로 발동하는 주문들은 발동하는 데 {2}가 더 든다."를 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그녀는 태어날 때부터 걸을 수 없었다. *엘루다*를 통해, 그녀는 날 수 있었다.

foreignNames.name: Vinculadora dos Céus Jubilante
foreignNames.text:
Voar
As criaturas que você controla com voar têm "As mágicas que seus oponentes conjuram tendo como alvo esta criatura custam {2} a mais para serem conjuradas."
foreignNames.flavor: Ela nasceu incapaz de andar. Por meio da *eludha*, ela foi capaz de voar.

foreignNames.name: Ликующая Узомантка Небес
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Существа с Полетом под вашим контролем имеют способность «Разыгрывание вашими оппонентами заклинаний, целью которых является это существо, стоит на {2} больше».
foreignNames.flavor: С рождения она не могла ходить. С *элудхой* она полетела.

foreignNames.name: 欢腾翔绊人
foreignNames.text:

由你操控且具飞行异能的生物具有「对手施放且以此生物为目标的咒语增加{2}来施放。」
foreignNames.flavor: 她生来便不能行走大地。但拜*灵绊*所赐，她能够翱翔天空。

cards.name: Kaheera, the Orphanguard
cards.text:
Companion — Each creature card in your starting deck is a Cat, Elemental, Nightmare, Dinosaur, or Beast card. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.)
Vigilance
Each other creature you control that's a Cat, Elemental, Nightmare, Dinosaur, or Beast gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

rulings.text: Your companion begins the game outside the game. In tournament play, this means your sideboard. In casual play, it’s simply a card you own that’s not in your starting deck.

Before shuffling your deck to become your library, you may reveal one card from outside the game to be your companion if your starting deck meets the requirements of the companion ability. You can’t reveal more than one. It remains revealed outside the game as the game begins.
The requirements of the companion ability apply only to your starting deck. They do not apply to your sideboard.

Creature cards in your deck may be a mix of the five creature types that Kaheera cares about. They may also have additional types, as long as each creature card is at least one of those five. Noncreature cards may have any subtypes.
The companion’s other abilities apply only if the creature is on the battlefield. They have no effect while the companion is outside the game.

The companion ability has no effect if the card is in your starting deck and creates no restriction on putting a card with a companion ability into your starting deck. For example, Zirda may be in your starting deck even if your other permanent cards don’t all have activated abilities.
You may have one companion in the Commander variant. Your deck, including your commander, must meet its companion requirement. Your companion is not one of your one hundred cards.

If more than one player wishes to reveal a companion, the starting player does so first, and players proceed in turn order. Once a player has chosen not to reveal a companion, that player can’t change their mind.
A creature that’s more than one of the five types gets +1/+1 only once from Kaheera’s last ability.

Once you put your companion into your hand, it behaves like any other card you’ve brought into the game. For example, if it’s countered or destroyed, it’s put into your graveyard, remaining in the game.

Wizards of the Coast has issued functional errata for the Companion mechanic. Instead of casting companions from outside the game: Once per game, any time you could cast a sorcery (during your main phase when the stack is empty), you can pay {3} to put your companion from your sideboard into your hand. This is a special action, not an activated ability. It happens immediately and can’t be responded to. It can’t be countered or stopped by cards like Phyrexian Revoker. For more information please see https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/news/june-1-2020-banned-and-restricted-announcement

foreignNames.name: Kaheera, Behüter der Verlassenen
foreignNames.text:
Gefährte — Jede Kreaturenkarte in deinem Startdeck ist eine Katze-, Elementarwesen-, Nachtmahr-, Dinosaurier- oder Bestie-Karte. (Falls du diese Karte als deinen Gefährten erwählt hast, kannst du sie einmal von außerhalb der Partie wirken.)
Wachsamkeit
Jede andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, die eine Katze, ein Elementarwesen, ein Nachtmahr, ein Dinosaurier oder eine Bestie ist, erhält +1/+1 und hat Wachsamkeit.

foreignNames.name: Kaheera, Custodiahuérfanos
foreignNames.text:
Compañero — Cada carta de criatura en tu mazo inicial es una carta de Felino, Elemental, Pesadilla, Dinosaurio o Bestia. (Si esta carta es el compañero que eliges, puedes lanzarla una vez desde fuera del juego.)
Vigilancia.
Cada otra criatura que controlas que sea Felino, Elemental, Pesadilla, Dinosaurio o Bestia obtiene +1/+1 y tiene la habilidad de vigilancia.

foreignNames.name: Kaheera, le Tuteur
foreignNames.text:
Compagnon — Chaque carte de créature de votre deck de départ est une carte de chat, d'élémental, de cauchemar, de dinosaure ou de bête. (Si cette carte est le compagnon de votre choix, vous pouvez la lancer une fois depuis l'extérieur de la partie.)
Vigilance
Chaque autre créature que vous contrôlez qui est un chat, un élémental, un cauchemar, un dinosaure ou une bête gagne +1/+1 et a la vigilance.

foreignNames.name: Kaheera, la Guardaorfani
foreignNames.text:
Compagno — Ogni carta creatura nel tuo mazzo iniziale è una carta Felino, Elementale, Incubo, Dinosauro o Bestia. (Se questa carta è il compagno che hai scelto, puoi lanciarla una volta dal di fuori della partita.)
Cautela
Ogni altra creatura che controlli che è Felino, Elementale, Incubo, Dinosauro o Bestia prende +1/+1 e ha cautela.

foreignNames.name: 孤児護り、カヒーラ
foreignNames.text:
相棒 ― あなたの開始時のデッキに入っている各クリーチャー・カードが、それぞれ猫かエレメンタルやナイトメアや恐竜やビーストであるカードであること。（このカードがあなたの選んだ相棒であるなら、あなたは１回のみゲームの外部からこれを唱えてもよい。）
警戒
他の、あなたがコントロールしていて猫やエレメンタルやナイトメアや恐竜やビーストである各クリーチャーは、それぞれ＋１/＋１の修整を受け警戒を持つ。

foreignNames.name: 고아수호자, 카히라
foreignNames.text:
단짝 — 당신의 시작 덱에 들어 있는 각 생물 카드는 고양이, 정령, 나이트메어, 공룡, 또는 야수 카드이다. (이 카드가 당신이 선택한 단짝이라면, 당신은 이 카드를 게임 밖에서 한 번 발동할 수 있다.)
경계
당신이 조종하는 다른 생물들 중 고양이, 정령, 나이트메어, 공룡, 또는 야수인 생물들은 +1/+1을 받고 경계를 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Kaheera, a Guardiã dos Órfãos
foreignNames.text:
Companheiro — Cada card de criatura em seu deck inicial é um card de Felino, Elemental, Pesadelo, Dinossauro ou Besta. (Se este card for o companheiro que escolheu, você poderá conjurá-lo uma vez de fora do jogo.)
Vigilância
Cada outra criatura que você controla que seja um Felino, Elemental, Pesadelo, Dinossauro ou Besta recebe +1/+1 e tem vigilância.

foreignNames.name: Кахира, Попечительница
foreignNames.text:
Компаньон — Каждая карта существа в вашей начальной колоде является картой Кошки, Элементаля, Кошмара, Динозавра или Зверя. (Если эта карта является вашим избранным Компаньоном, то вы можете один раз разыграть ее из-за пределов игры.)
Бдительность
Каждое другое существо под вашим контролем, которое является Кошкой, Элементалем, Кошмаром, Динозавром или Зверем, получает +1/+1 и имеет Бдительность.

foreignNames.name: 孤兽守卫卡席拉
foreignNames.text:
行侣～你起始套牌中各生物牌均为猫、元素、梦魇、恐龙或野兽牌。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以从游戏外施放它，但仅限一次。）
警戒
由你操控且为猫、元素、梦魇、恐龙或野兽的其他生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。

foreignNames.name: 孤獸守衛卡席拉
foreignNames.text:
行侶～你起始套牌中各生物牌均為貓、元素、夢魘、恐龍或野獸牌。（如果你選擇這張牌作為你的行侶，則你可以從遊戲外施放它，但僅限一次。）
警戒
由你操控且為貓、元素、夢魘、恐龍或野獸的其他生物得+1/+1且具有警戒異能。

foreignNames.text:
慧眼の導師が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしていて人間でないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それの上に警戒カウンターを１個置く。
